five_star_reviews.text: I cannot say enough about Veterans plumbing. We were a victim of these crazy freezing temps and our laundry room pipe busted late Christmas afternoon. I called several plumbers and someone recommended Nick with Veterans. I called him and he answered on Christmas Day and said he could send someone out the next day. Every other plumber was Tuesday or Wednesday the earliest. They showed up early too and the value compared to what I have paid before was unbeatable. I had to ask Nick if the price was correct before I paid, as it was the best price I have seen in sometime. I am so glad I received this recommendation and they will definitely be my new plumbers of choice going forward!
We had our main water line leaking. Nick did an amazing job replacing the line and then helped us with extensive piping issue in our basement. Quality work, honest company. Highly recommend.
I received same day service.  They showed up on time.  Discussed issues with me before doing repair.  Cost was reasonable.  Very courteous.  Veterans is my plumber of choice.
Outstanding service. Arrived on time and did the job in very quick and professional way. I would highly recommend this company to anyone.
Nick was very polite and professional and did the work in a timely manner.
Very personable  and professional.He took about an hour and a half to identify 5 leaks in my water line and  fix them plus covered back up the trench.
Very polite and professional! I have used this young man several times. He knows his plumbing. You won’t be disappointed!
Great work! Respectful, and easy to work with.
Very responsive and helpful. Would use their service again and highly recommend them!

We were building a garage apartment that had no plumbing or water to the structure. After several quotes, we decided to go with veteran plumbing. Nick was great to work with and very professional. The quality of work was top notch. I had concerns over locating and running water to the apartment, but Nick very professionally located the water line and was able to determine the best options to correctly run the water line to the new structire. I am very pleased with the service and finished product that Nick provided. I would highly recommend him and he will be my first call when I need future work. Great experience

Nick is a professional in all definitions of the word professional. We have used him on multiple occasions for different plumbing needs.  A true Veteran and brother in arms who stands by his country and his work 110%.

Nick had been great working with us. Quality work, he has done work for us and our children with on time service  and competitive prices. What impresses me most is he uses top notch materials and has always let us know what he wants to do and it has always been in our best interest. We have postponed work to make sure we use him instead of others. Highly recommend, if you have an opportunity use Nick/ Veterans Plumbing LLC

Nick replaced a faulty hot water heater and PRV on short notice. His work ethic and expertise was impressive and commendable.  I typically value quality of work over price, but with Nick, you get both. I will call on his skills again and highly recommend his services.

Veteran Plumbing installed all the plumbing for my brand new coffee house in Acworth. It was a huge job. Nick is incredibly responsive, has extremely competitive pricing (I priced 3 different companies), and does wonderful, clean work. My job had to be inspected by the county, and they never had any issues with Nick's work. He is also enjoyable to be around, which is a bonus! Save yourself some time and call Nick for your job. You'll be glad you did!

Nick did a great job on our kitchen ceiling leak. There were three holes that needed to be repaired, and another pipe that was questionable. He replaced all 3 pipes, plus the 4th for no additional charge.  Very professional and uses the best equipment for the job. 4 patches done in under an hour.

Nick and The Veteran Plumbling LLC Team are true life savers. Each time we call, there is no job too big and there is no job too small. No matter the time of day, they are there to answer the call and provide complimentary diagnostics by phone. There is no greater value than Free Advice. And, there is no greater company than Veteran Plumbing LLC.

Fabulous job Nick!  I had some serious plumbing issues in my home (prior plumbing from a different plumber that was installed incorrectly).  Nick was able to get it all fixed quickly and CORRECTLY!  Very professional and knowledgeable!  Thank you!!!

You couldn't ask for a more honest and fair plummer. Nick came when he said he would and fixed my water leak. This is the second time I've used him and wouldn't think of having anyone else do any plumbing work for me. I highly recommend him as he makes sure the job is done correctly and offered no surprises when it came to his bill.
You won't be sorry. Just give him a call..

five_star_reviews.text: I HIGHLY recommend Cochran brothers plumbing and gas! I called Blake at 7pm and he was at my house within 30 minutes.. Our lines were clogged and he had it unclogged in a very short time! He is very skilled and professional in his work and is very reasonable in his pricing! Thank you blake for such quick and excellent work! I will recommend you to everyone I know!

The Cochran Brothers accomplished a task that others had deemed impossible. My mother had long desired a gas stove, and today, the Cochran Brothers made her dream a reality. Their exceptional professionalism and honesty have undoubtedly earned them more customers. I highly recommend their services. They responded promptly to my inquiry, demonstrating their reliability. I am grateful to Steven Butler for the recommendation.

Had a great experience with Blake Cochran when I needed a rusted out, leaky pipe repaired/replaced!

Quick response to my inquiries, easy to communicate with, honest and open about the prices and the process, and showed up fast to fix the issue! Thanks so much for the good work, Blake!

Amazing experience! Blake was out here quickly! Communicated the entire time ! Was the best plumber experience we have ever had. Very nice guy, extremely kind and respectful.  10/10 highly recommend. 😊

If you need a plumber, I HIGHLY recommend Blake Cochran from Cochran Brothers Plumbing and Gas LLC.
I called him last week about a shower valve leak, and he came by within hours to come check it out and gave me a FREE estimate. Blake showed me the possible causes of the leak, and then provided me with different options for the repair. He gave me a reasonable price, so we scheduled the job. He arrived ON TIME and was ready to get to work thinking the whole faucet would need to be replaced and the tile would need to be cut out. Once he started the job, he was HONEST and explained that some simple parts were all that were needed to repair the leak which LOWERED the cost significantly. He is organized, and the invoice was easy to pay right then by credit card with an instant digital receipt for my records.
Amazing service and repair. Would highly, highly  recommend the Cochran Brothers for any plumbing needs/repairs!
Great service! Will definitely use again!

My elderly mom lives in Gadsden and a water leak had dripped downstairs into her den. She did not know what was wrong. I tried to find someone who could come soon to find the leak and fix it. Many plumbers do not return calls or are booked out for days. Jonathan at Machen did return my call and said to call Cochran Brothers. I am so glad I did! He came out the very next morning at 8:30 and said it was the toilet tank upstairs. He replaced the toilet that same morning. We will always use Cochran for our plumbing problems.
Another handyman had looked upstairs and wanted to tear out the tile wall. I am so glad we didn't do that! It's best to call a licensed plumber and I recommend Cochran Brothers.

five_star_reviews.text: We had our house supply line replaced, and K-Wood did a great job for a better price than other estimates we received. Went the extra mile to make sure the connection inside our house was clean and would last.

We had a leaking gas water heater. I called K-Wood about 2:00 this afternoon, and the water heater that I picked up today was installed by 4:30. Fast and professional service at less than half the price the larger plumbing companies wanted. They even hauled away my old heater.
5 stars has never let us down at our complex. Wheather it is big or small.
K-Wood was excellent. They responded timely, did a great job, were very nice and very reasonably priced! Will definitely use again!

Called to get a damaged shower repaired. Told him about the problem and he was able to give me a non binding guesstimate over the phone. I ask you who is willing to do that. He and his helper were courteous, professional and fast. Job well done! We will defiantly use them again.

Kelli and his team were so professional and did a great job! They showed up early, installed our water heater, and Kelli even unclogged the drain in our tub for no charge though they weren't there for that. Our water heater is working great and we'll be using them for our other plumbing needs!

## Business Information:

### Alabama Business Registration/License Details
Muddy Buddy's Plumbing LLC is a registered business in Alabama, and while the specific license details are not provided in the sources, it is mentioned that the business is in an industry that may require professional licensing, bonding, or registration. Customers are advised to check with the appropriate agency, such as the State of Alabama Plumbers & Gas Fitters Examining Board, to ensure all requirements are met[1][2].

### Physical Location and Service Areas
Muddy Buddy's Plumbing LLC is located in Huntsville, AL 35804-2673. The service areas include Madison, Huntsville, Decatur, and Athens[1][2].

### Hours and Payment Methods
The business operates from 7:30 AM to 4:30 PM, Monday through Friday. On Saturdays and Sundays, they are available by appointment only. Payment methods accepted include Debit Card, Credit Card, Cash, Check, ACH, and CashApp[1].

### Years in Operation
Muddy Buddy's Plumbing LLC was founded in June 2020 and has been in operation for approximately 3 years as of the latest available data[1][2].

## Services & Specialties:

### Types of Services Offered
Muddy Buddy's Plumbing LLC offers a variety of services including:
- Residential plumbing
- Plumbing repair & renovation
- Backflow testing
- Backflow prevention devices
- Drainage contractor services
- Sewer cleaning
- Water heater parts & repair
- Installation and repair of water heaters (tankless, electric, and gas)
- Repipe services
- New sewer lines and water service
- Clogged sinks, toilet issues, showers not draining, sinks leaking, faucet swap outs, pressure issues, leaks, and finding causes of high water bills
- Outside hose spigots
- Small plumbing remodel jobs for residential and commercial clients[1][2].

### Service Areas Covered
The service areas include Madison, Huntsville, Decatur, and Athens[1][2].

### Emergency Service Availability
While the sources do not explicitly mention 24/7 emergency services, they do indicate prompt response times, such as fixing a toilet leak within 24 hours[2].

### Prices or Rates
There is no detailed pricing information provided in the sources. However, customers have mentioned that the services are "very, very affordable"[2].

## Customer Reviews & Reputation:

### Review Summaries with Specific Examples
Customers have praised Muddy Buddy's Plumbing for their excellent service, punctuality, and quality work. For example, one customer mentioned that the plumbers were out within 24 hours to fix a toilet leak and explained the issue in simplified detail. Another customer praised the affordability and quality of the work, having used their services for multiple jobs[2].

### BBB Rating and Status
Muddy Buddy's Plumbing LLC is BBB Accredited since February 3, 2022, and holds an A+ rating[1].

### Common Customer Feedback Themes
Common themes include excellent service, punctuality, quality work, and affordability. However, there is one notable complaint regarding issues with work quality, cleanliness, and communication, which the business has responded to but not resolved to the customer's satisfaction[1][3].

### Response to Reviews
The business has responded to the complaint on the BBB platform, but the responses indicate a lack of resolution and a decision not to engage further with the dissatisfied customer. The business has stated that the work was completed well and that they will not be refunding for work that was not included in the original scope[3].

## Owner & Staff:

### Owner/Management Information
The owner of Muddy Buddy's Plumbing LLC is Mr. Buddy Wachter. He has been a journeyman plumber for 22 years before starting the business in June 2020[1][2].

### Staff Qualifications
The business has grown from a one-man service team to having three trucks and an office staff. However, specific qualifications of the staff other than the owner are not provided[2].

### Professional Certifications
The business is licensed and insured, but specific professional certifications of the staff are not detailed in the sources[2].

five_star_reviews.text: If you need any plumbing needs, Vaugh’s Superior Plumbing is SUPERIOR. They are easy to communicate with, easy to work with, on time, professional, kind, and do great work! I will never consider any other company.
Answerd on the first call and responded same day, very knowledgeable and professional. He is really a good person with a great attitude. Prices are very competitive
Called Justin up on a Sunday he came out right away fixed our sewage pipe quickly. He is very good and very honest.
He was very pleasant very fast and did very good work.Needed him late at night and he got here in a quick overtime.Very good very good company
Justin did a great job at my home was on time and very professional! I plan to use him again and refer him to friends and family!! Thanks again Justin
Justin is very professional and knowledgable. He not only fixes the problem, but gets to the root of the issue. Definitely recommend!

Had a bad leak in my front yard. Justin answered the phone right away when I called. He came out very quickly on a holiday. Located the problem and fixed in a timely matter. Justin explained the process as he went along. He was very professional and I would definitely recomend.

Amazing quality, excellent service, great prices.
Justin is a good and dependable plumber. He’s completed several projects for us and does really good work.
Justin arrived on schedule and solved our problem.  He was very courteous and professional.  I would use him again when I need plumbing work.  Very pleased with the work he performed.

Justin is an amazing plumber!  He is professional, efficient and very knowledgeable.  He was punctual and didn’t waste any time fixing my plumbing issues.  It was a pleasure doing business with him.  I would recommend him without a doubt.  Happiest plumber in Alabama!

five_star_reviews.text: Hot water line and later cold water line to hot water heater blew out. Came out on two different days to repair the lines. Couldn't ask for a better experience.
Patrick was quick to respond and did an excellent job on site prep and grading our yard. Great hourly rates. Will have him back for other projects in the near future. Highly recommend!
I have used champion multiple times and they always do a great job. I will recommend them to everyone from now on.

Definitely recommend Champion Plumbing. Had a plumbing leak under my kitchen sink and Patrick Sullivan came and fixed the same day I called. Even though he was super busy, Patrick kept me updated of when he would be there and even came after 6pm. I appreciate how friendly and responsive he was and quickly repaired my plumbing issue. Would definitely use him again.

Just want to give a shout out to Champion Plumbing and Remodeling LLC and Remodeling LLCas we had had a water line break yesterday and Patrick and his friend went “above and beyond” yesterday and last night. They made sure we had water and fixed our busted line well after midnight. As a Retired Veteran I know about going above and beyond. Thank you both so much as you were truly a blessing me and my family. I will highly recommend Champion Plumbing to everyone. Extremely professional and friendly!!!

I called Patrick at Champion, we discussed my job. He came and looked it over, got a parts list, just very professional in my opinion. He showed up to do the job, had everything, a plan and things went smoothly. I was very impressed with his work, his reasoning for things. He discussed options during the installation as well. Extremely pleased with the quality and explanation of install. Would highly recommend!!
MOST EXCELLENT SERVICE‼️ I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS COMPANY. EFFICIENT, FRIENDLY, PROFESSIONAL.

Mr. Sullivan was recommended to me after a different plumbing company was overcharging for the job.  He came and hooked up my sink and faucett quickly and efficiently and charged a reasonable price.  Very happy with his professionalism and honest way of dealing with folks.  I would recommend him to all my friends and family.

I have used Patrick with Champion Plumbing for a couple of years. I have never found a more professional and honest plumber. I have complete confidence in his skills and have recommended him to everyone in my family and work.

I called Champion Plumbing because of their rating and because they work on mobile home plumbing. I was not disappointed. They installed my new sink and faucet and commode in a very timely matter! They did an excellent  job! I have put their number in my contact list as I will definitely  use their services whenever we have plumbing needs.
Was able to come out on short notice, and did a professional install of new hot water heater. Installed a new shutoff valve on the copper as well. Takes cash, check, or card.

I was really happy with the service I received from this company.  We had a 100-yer old sink that needed new works that were non-standard.  They worked with us to get as close a match as as possible, were in contact when it took a while to get the parts, and installed them professionally and quickly.  We were extremely happy with the service and will use them again in any repairs that we may need.  Thanks guys!
Pleasure to work with Patrick and his crew.  Quick response, on time and fair price.  I will recommend Champion Plumbing to all of my family and friends.
Great experience with this company. They did an awesome job for me!

Very responsive and very professional.
Would recommend 100 percent
Im not the type of person that trust easy but let me tell you great guy very eager to get the job done and seems very excited about making sure all your needs are done and done right the first time.
Give them a shout
Patrick came to the house twice.  One company told me I needed to spend $4000  to repair the issue.  Patrick corrected the issue for 460.  He is a honest guy.  I will use him again!

We had a septic back up on April 24th which was on a weekend. Patrick showed up when NO ONE else would, stayed at our home until he found us a restoration company that came the same day and a septic company that could pump the system. He then helped us navigate the insurance process, secured a contractor and made all the plumbing repairs. It's been a two month process and he has been there to help at a moment's notice every step of the way. We cannot recommend him strongly enough!  As long as he's in this business, he will get all of our plumbing business. Great guy with a strong work ethic and is a veteran as well!  We are so appreciative of his time and help. He goes over and beyond to serve his customers.
Patrick with Champion was great! Professional and on time. Was also almost $200 less than others. I definitely have a new go to plumber!

The work went great. I submitted for a quote, received a call 30 minutes later and they came did the job today. They are great guys who did an ever better job and Champion is veteran-owned which makes it even better. I would highly recommend them for any plumbing needs.

Excellent service, timely, reasonably priced and incredibly professional. He installed a new garbage disposal for me in no time and had my kitchen sink back up and running properly. I highly recommend his services.

five_star_reviews.text: Antwon the owner did an amazing job. He was prompt and very knowledgeable. He not only called right back, but he also charged exactly what he quoted. I was also pleased with his invoicing system. I received an invoice along with a detailed breakdown and picture of my services rendered. I definitely recommend and will use Glory plumbing again.

High quality, prompt, and professional service that I highly recommend.

Antwon and his team arrived to my home early, and quickly got to work assessing the problem we had with two malfunctioning faucets and fixing it.  He even checked to make sure our water pressure was at the recommended levels to preempt any future issues.  All for an affordable price.

If your husband is like me, handy but really better at making temporary fixes until you can find a long term solution, then call Glory Plumbing and get them scheduled for a visit.  They'll get you squared away.
Love his work..Accurate,Knowledgeable and got the job done for a good price..5 ⭐️

This company is highly recommended. They came out in less than hour for an emergency plumbing service call after business hours. Antwon was very professional and explained everything to us and provided a detailed invoice before the work was done. He was fast, proficient and his work is very neat! He is now one of our preferred Service Pros.

Antwuan was very very VERY professional and took care of my water leak issues. He squeezed me into his busy day in such short notice and went above and beyond to tend the services that was needed. I highly recommend his services to anyone in need of any plumbing related issues. Thank you!!!!!!!!!
He was fast,professional,and very informative about the job and process.Great Job! I recommend to anyone with a plumbing problem.
He was very professional. He finished at a timely fashion. It’s very hard trying to find a reasonable plumber. I feel he is a very fair plumber!

Listen... I can not say enough about how pleased, impressed and THANKFUL I am for this company!! Antwon and young man assisting him worked well into two nights to assure that my mother had running water, after extremely frigid weather caused pipes to bust. He didn't just patch it up, he thoroughly fixed the problems, explaining everything along the way!! Kind, courteous and very professional!!  I highly recommend this company!!$$
This company is the BEST!!! Very professional, very clean, and very fast. He came in same day repaired a broken toilet and flange. He is the best in town!!!! HANDS DOWN!!!!

Antwon helped us remodel our bathroom. We hired him after our initial contractor made a mess of the plumbing install, and he was communicative, patient, and thorough. He is trustworthy, kind and skilled as a plumber, and we are grateful to have worked with him! We will hire him again next time we need a plumber.

This is one of the best Plummer by Far. If he gives you a time trust me he's on point. His work is very professional and he does a great job. And don't mind explaining any questions you might have. I don't know about most people but being a home owner it's hard to find a professional Plummer. My search is over he is the real deal 💯

I had previously used Glory Drain and they did a great job! When I called this time, they were once again prompt, professional and complete the job in a timely manner. I will definitely use them again if needed!

Glory Drain is superb in every way. As accidents go, I experienced a plumbing mishap late on a Friday night. It got a bit more complex given that it might have been linked to a previous repair by the city. GD not only reached my home within an hour of notice, they stuck with us until the city came out and did its due diligence a few days later.  If you are looking for excellent service and pride of ownership, Glory Drain is the company for you.

The last company made a quick fix to stop our kitchen sink from clogging, but it came back and this company was referred to me.  They explained the issue, costs and made repairs in a timely manner.  They’re thorough.

I had a leak in front yard starting to flood out my basement.  The local city utilities company had ancient pipes with shut off I couldn't find. Glory Drain was there within an hour to shut it off.   My insurance sent there plumber out they did work then it started to leak.  We were fed up and ready to replace the service line. Glory Drain was the only estimate we could afford.   They came out the very next day and finished in less than 5 hours.   They even helped me apply to utility company to get a credit back for water lost from the leak.   Glory Drain Cleaning Services will be the only plumber I will call.
Great work and nice attitude

five_star_reviews.text: We had a plumbing emergency on Sunday of a holiday weekend. Everyone we called either didn’t answer, or didn’t want to come. Joey from JW Plumbing answered right away, was super polite, AND was pulling in our driveway not long after we talked over the phone. He took care of the issue in no time, and his rates are great. I cannot recommend JW Plumbing enough. Joey - thank you so much for everything!!

Mr. Lawson was able to come out quick and fixed our issue with ease. Perfect man to call for fast, efficient plumbing work at a reasonable cost.
(Also his responses to 1 star comments are hilarious)
I know who I’ll be contacting with any plumbing needs from now on. Jeremy was detailed, honest and thorough in his work and at a fair price. 10/10 recommend!!
I’ve used Lawson Plumbing twice and both times I got quick service, with everything fixed to my satisfaction.

Jeremy came late in the evening and found why the sink and shower were backing up. A temporary solution was set up with plans to come back on Saturday. He was very knowledgeable and a pleasure to have service our home.

We called JW Lawson Plumbing Tuesday evening and Jeremy came the next day to help with an outside water meter issue. He was able to identify it within a few minutes and fix the problem. He’s very knowledgeable and a Great Plumber!  We are so very happy he was able to help us so quickly and will definitely keep his number for all plumbing related issues going forward. Thank you Jeremy!!
Helped solve a problem with a gas leak over s weekend .  Prompt service and good results
Highly recommend this company. We had a massive water leak. Gentleman came quickly and fixed the problem. Excellent work, very professional, and courteous.

I call him on a Monday. He came out on Tuesday. He fix my plumbing problem that day.. He did a great job. He is a excellent plumber. I would recommend him to everyone. He was so nice. Just  excellent customer service.
Quick to respond when I called. Came out the same day and made the repairs needed. Will use his services again.

Lawson Plumbing will be my go-to for any and all future plumbing needs. Jeremy came out on a Sunday morning, was very professional and courteous, charged a fair price, and did excellent work in a timely manner. Will use again.
JW was quick to respond when I needed a plumber. His communication and timeliness was so helpful. We didn’t need him to come out after all but he’ll be top of our list going forward.

I highly recommend JW plumbing. Jeremy came and fixed what I screwed up and was professional and did a great job. He also fixed something that wasn’t done correctly when my house was built. Fair priced exceptional service.
Very professional, got to the house promptly and fixed all the issues I had, will continue to use his services in the future, highly recommended

I called them up on a Sunday morning and told them I had a main line water leak. I was told that they would come out that evening and see what they could do. They were very prompt with the time and very knowledgeable, courteous about plumbing. They got right on the job and fixed it quickly. When I have another problem I will definitely be giving them a call!!!!
Jermey went above and beyond to fix our ice marker and even went the extra mile to fix our garbage disposal and other things around the house! I highly recommend!

My dad  gave me this number when i told him about a leak I had under my house. Said he called them awhile back about work he needed done. Turned out to be something that would have to be dealt with by the city, but apparently one of these guys felt bad about not being able to address the underlying issue, so he decided to clean up and repair some of the damage that had been caused by it.  Took about an hour and he didn't charge a dime.

Cut to the chase, I am so glad I made this call because Jeremy was very timely in his response and in getting the job done. Very knowledgeable and professional with competitive pricing. Definitely our  go-to now for any future plumbing needs. Very highly recommend. 10 stars

We’ve called this Man countless times over the years from what seemed to him to be simple at times to the seriously down and dirty side of the business. He handled every job with absolute professionalism and respect for my wife, family and home were beyond exceptional. Five Stars isn’t enough and I don’t have a vast enough vocabulary to put into words how much I recommend and trust this company

Jeremy is a great guy. Called at 8:30 P.M. for a bad backup and he was here in 20 minutes. He stayed until 11 to make sure everything was fixed. Highly recommend Jeremy and will use him going forward for any plumbing needs

I reached out to Jeremy on a Sunday at 11:30am about a clogged kitchen sink, I was unable to plunge or snake myself effectively. He responded quickly and after a few questions over the next half hour or so, He arrived at ~2:15 pm. The issue and everything was done by 3:00 pm. He was very knowledgeable and helpful. I would recommend
Arrived on time, fixed all problems that were pending. We  had to order a drain and he will come back to install. Professional work, very neat left nothing to be cleaned up!
Thank you for your help! We had a very stressful plumbing issue that Jeremy was able to fix in a very efficient and timely manner. Would definitely recommend!

Friendly, quick, and did a great job! He was very fast responding to our situation, and he did a great job explaining the problem and possible solutions. I would definitely call them with any emergency or non emergency plumbing needs!!
J.W. LAWSON PLUMBING was the best.  I needed emergency service.  They were fast to arrive and did an outstanding job.  I would highly recommend.

Quoted me a time and arrived promptly. Fixed some additional things in bathroom willingly. Gave me a short pep talk and also taught me something about plumbing if I were to become a homeowner. Great guy.
Jim came out quickly and effectively cleared the clog in my bathroom sink! Would recommend using them again!
We have used them a couple of times and they are always fantastic with the work they do, their quick response to issues and quick turn around!
Went out of his way to come and fix a pipe that had damage from a freeze. Was very efficient and took the time and insulated it which wasn't even done before.  Would highly recommend.
JW Lawson did a great job clearing my kitchen sink drain. I recommend Mr. Lawson to anybody that needs to get a plumbing problem fixed
J.W. Lawson Plumbing is just amazing!!! He is always dependable, always available, and overall a great help.10/10 always recommend.

Jeremy came out quickly to address a minor emergency.  His workmanship was very high quality & he cleaned the work area when he finished.  I highly recommend JW Lawson plumbing. I will call them for my next job.
Second time we have used J.W. Lawson Plumbing. Another wonderful experience - Professional work, reasonable prices, great people.
Highly recommend this company!!! Service was great and speedy service to fix my water problem in my home!!!

God Bless you and keep you.  Thomas and Katrina  Hayden, Alabama.

J. W. Lawson was actually my third call. The first 2 on a Google search, one, I left a message and never got a return call. The 2nd number was disconnected. Jeremy answered promptly. I let him know I was calling for my 85 yr old Mom and I was 100 miles away. Her kitchen sink was stopped up. Jeremy let me know he didn't have his schedule set for the day but would call my Mom and text me when he was heading to my Mom's house. I received a text at 11:36am and an hour later problem was taken care of. It's nice to know that someone with integrity is there to help in time of need. If another plumbing problem arises, I will certainly call J.W. Lawson Plumbing again.

I called on Friday afternoon due to not wanting to drain out of the washer. My husband checked the piping downstairs and discovered that one joint had come completely unsealed and was also leaking into the basement. Jeremy said he would be here the next morning. Not only was he on time, he was actually a bit early. He immediately got to work. He thought initially the septic tank might need pumped, however, on further inspection,  the pipe in the basement had come loose from what was holding it up properly and was now sitting at a downward angle. It wasn't allowing everything to pass through and thus there was a huge clog. Jeremy soon had everything cleaned out, that section of pipe replaced and resealed, and mounted back to the wall properly. He was extremely professional, courteous and I will most definitely call him again should I need anything in the future.
Thank you Jeremy!

Jeremy Lawson is the finest craftsman I know.  He is skillful and totally honest and his prices are very reasonable. That solved all three problems completely.  He is a terrific person to work with.

website_content.aboutUs: QPI Services Inc. is a premier plumbing company serving Mobile and the surrounding areas of Alabama. Our team of highly skilled and certified professionals specializes in providing top-notch plumbing solutions, from routine maintenance to complex installations and repairs. With a deep understanding of local plumbing codes and a commitment to exceptional customer service, we ensure every job is completed with precision and efficiency.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Experience the peace of mind that comes with choosing a trusted local plumbing expert.
sellingPoints: Rapid response times for all plumbing emergencies, ensuring your issues are resolved promptly.
Comprehensive plumbing services, from minor repairs to major installations, all handled with expertise.
Transparent pricing and upfront cost estimates, so you know exactly what to expect.

five_star_reviews.text: I recently was in the process of getting my home refinanced and had to have some repairs done. I googled and talked to several other contractors that set dates and times and didn't even bother to show up. I called Brook Investment Properties and Mike showed up the same day gave me a quote and had the work done the next day. He is my go to for any of my home repairs

This is one of the most professional companies I’ve worked with in a long time

For the last year I have been trying to get a handyman out to my house to do some small projects. I had some rotten wood, some painting, etc.

I couldn’t get anyone to come out, nor could I get anyone to give me a quote or even return a phone call

They go above and beyond and exhibit extreme professionalism and courtesy

Something you don’t see anymore

I really appreciated them going above and beyond on my house project.

I had cut a cable wire behind the house

And they ended up having to stay three hours late to fix it in the dark with flashlights,

And they did not have to fix my mistake.

That is professionalism Defined

I will be using them again in the future and I really appreciate y’all Brooke investment !

My pipes bursted at one of my rental properties and everyone else told me it would be days before they could come out and fix it. Brook Investment Properties LLC arrived in a hour 1/2 and got the pipe replaced in 2 hours, Definitely recommend!!

I hired Mr. Westbrook for some plumbing work and he did an awesome job. Price was very reasonable and he fixed the problem expeditiously. Have not had an issue with the plumbing since. Highly recommend this guy.

I don't normally do reviews but for Brooke investment property I must do one this time. I was astonished by the work you performed. I was overly pleased not only with the price but also his work ethics. He mentioned that he does it all and I am willing to vouch and say the same for him. He performed plumbing, electrical, roofing, and also finish my deck. He is now my go-to guy.

We have been using Tristan as our plumber for over 2 years and he has always done an amazing job at an affordable rate! He only uses the best materials and will do his best to complete the work quickly without the quality suffering. Definitely recommend!!!
Great Service! They did an excellent job and had my issue fixed quickly. Would highly recommend and I will definitely use them again.
They were so awesome and super nice! I Would 100 percent recommend to anyone. They fixed my bathroom drain and got a ton of stuff out of it. I called so last minute and they came out right then!

Tristan and Nathaniel were awesome. The are professional and great Godly men.I am glad they could come out on short notice. They gave me the get out jail free card by fixing my faucet on my shower and not having to replace the valve. I will for sure use them again and so should you. I will tell all my friends about them. Thanks guys and God Bless.

Of the 3 companies I called, IPS was able to respond the fastest.  The 2 gentlemen who came out were easy to work with, listened to my thoughts/comments on the job, and then provided an agreeable solution at a fair price.

These guys were great.  We needed a basement sewage ejector pump replaced before company came into town.  They made time to fit us in their busy schedule and get the new one installed.  The placement of the pump was in a very tight spot, but these guys kept everything clean while replacing.  Highly recommend as they do excellent work and see the project through until the end.  Thanks Innovative Plumbing Solutions!!!

I had a leaking shower & Nathaniel & Tristen came right away to look at the issue. I thought I would have to replace my whole shower because of the old system, they ended up just replacing the shower head, shower nozzle and the shower faucet. They did it all in one day. Very polite and sweet brothers that I could trust if I had to leave the house in case of emergency. Highly recommend their business.

We are very pleased with the timely response and repair of our water heater. We did not have hot water the morning we were leaving for a week. We were able to call and get an appointment setup immediately on our return. Not only that but we had to call to reschedule because of ourselves not being able to make the time frame. No problem! This company worked us in the next day to accommodate. We are so pleased with the repair and them accommodating us! Highly recommend and we will use them again!
Cannot recommend Tristan and Nathan enough! Arrived very quickly and solved the problem in a matter of minutes. Very knowledgeable and professional guys!

Innovative Plumbing got our project done.  They were literally the 6th company to address our HVAC issues and they were the only ones that went the extra mile to get it done.  The others would just put band aids on the problem and it would eventually come back.  They are problem solvers and can handle the jobs that others don't want to mess with.  Tristan and Nathaniel are nice guys and true professionals!

I am not even within their typical service distance, but they came anyway and did a fantastic job! I love  my new shower and now I have plenty of hot water. Their attention to detail, professionalism, and quality work amazed me because of the price.  I am so glad I found this company. I highly recommend them for  all plumbing and repairs. Tristan has a great work ethic.
Tristan & Nathaniel came right out, diagnosed the problem & fixed it!! Two professional & nice guys! I would definitely recommend them!

I'm SO glad I found these guys!  Over the years, I've felt like I was being taken advantage of by other plumbers, but now that I've found Innovative Plumbing, I'll never call anyone else for my plumbing needs.  Tristan is one of those guys that can fix ANYTHING.  The office manager, April, was quick to respond when I asked for information and was easy to deal with.  I will definitely do business with them, again.

five_star_reviews.text: The services with this company was great. Nathan and his team was very professional throughout the entire process.

I would highly recommend! Very fast service, great experience all around from me calling to the time of service. Thank you Nathan will definitely be useing them in the future for all my plumping needs!
Nathan has performed many services for us and he’s excellent.
Flippo was very accommodating.  Worked my emergency in his schedule and repaired the leak quickly.  Always call Flippo!

Complete professional, responded to my initial inquiry immediately, provided a quote the following bussiness day, completed the project before the original timeline. Nathan treated my home as if it was his, utilized proactive measures to ensure that he left the area cleaner and better than he found it! 100% will use again for future projects.

Flippo Restoration and Maintenance has been our go to for years. They have done everything at our home from lighting to pipes in the walls! We will never use anyone else! If you have a problem or just a project, give Nathan a call!!!

Nathan is a plumber among plumbers. Super helpful, knew exactly what to do, had all the necessary tools, communicated well, arrived on time and did the job quickly and expertly. Beyond satisfied with his work, and he shall be my go to plumber from now on!

Emergency service needed over the weekend and he was the only one that would even answer the phone. Came out promptly and assisted us and got our problem resolved. Would highly recommend and can't thank him enough for taking the time to help us.

Prompt, professional, and knowledgeable. From the minute we called Nathan, we felt secure and confident knowing that our project was being done the right way. We will be calling Flippo Restoration for all our future projects and needs.
Easy to talk to and answered my questions
Very prompt service. Had leaky valve on toilet. Came out same day. Very nice people to work with. Will use again.
We had a busted pipe and Flippo Restoration and Maintenance had it fixed in just a couple of hours! Very professional and friendly.
Nathan delivered a quality and timely service.

Nathan went out of his way to please me in all that he did for me.
He was such a professional, and a genuinely nice guy.
Exceeded our expectations and has an awesome team, they get the job done quickly and professionaly. Highly recommended. Very pleased with the outcome! Will definitely continue to use them again!

Nathan and his crew did an excellent job.
We had a bathroom leak going into the bedroom.
They did everything as promised and very nice guys you can trust to get the job done correctly.
I would recommend them to anyone.
Excellent work and customer service ! I would recommend this company 10/10 to anyone I know .

Nathan is prompt, professional, helpful with advise, and he works well with our other construction teams.  I’ve hired his company before, and I’ve seen him meet every challenge, and as a house flipper, you just never know what the next surprise might be.
I can easily recommend this company!

I have a brother in law in plumbing . he looked over my invoice . he said it would of cost more where he is from
so the prices are reasonable no matter what anyone says  and the work was excellent.
Very Professional My Experience Was Great I Would Definitely Recommend Flippo Restoration And Maintenance.Job well done 100%
This is a very well managed company. Very quick response time and excellent work.

We were so impressed with our dealings with Flippo's Restoration. He is the only business we called that jumped right in to help us promptly and was there within the hour. We had extensive work done and he was there to navigate us the whole way through. His work was done as expected, everything left clean, and he did everything possible to meet our requests within a timely manner. We will definitely recommend and call again if the need ever arises!
Professional company that’s comes and gets the job done. We use them for all of our jobs. It’s nice to know they really are there after the job is done. Awesome job guys!
Excellent work and very reasonable prices! Will definitely use again.

Had Nathan and his guys do a couple jobs for us. Had a one inch copper pipe installed at Mural City Coffee Company. This is a highly visible pipe and had to be perfect. Needless to say, it was done flawlessly.
Nathan has fixed a couple more issues we have had as well.
As a home inspector, I have seen plenty of his work throughout the years and it has always been too notch. Check out his webpage and Facebook pages and see for yourself.
Thanks Nathan.

I recently had the pleasure of working with Flippo Restoration and I must say that it was the best decision I ever made and a pleasure working with Flippo. He helped me every step of the way . He even accompanied me to a meeting with the City of Dothan. Flippo is very professional and great at what he do. I highly recommend this company.

website_content.aboutUs: Serving the Florala, Crestview, Laurel Hill, DeFuniak Springs, Opp, Sampson, Andalusia, and surrounding areas, Jay's Plumbing and Handyman Service is a trusted local expert in comprehensive plumbing solutions. Our skilled technicians specialize in plumbing repairs, pipe repairs, drain cleaning, and a wide range of handyman services including tile work and complete remodels. With a commitment to professionalism and quality workmanship, we strive to exceed your expectations on every job.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Experience the peace of mind that comes with our 24/7 emergency plumbing services, ensuring your needs are met promptly and efficiently, day or night.
sellingPoints: Rapid response times and clear communication, so you're never left waiting or wondering about the status of your project.
Meticulous attention to detail and a commitment to doing the job right the first time, saving you from costly callbacks or rework.
A comprehensive range of plumbing and handyman services under one roof, providing a convenient one-stop solution for all your home repair and renovation needs.

five_star_reviews.text: Boxcar, Chris Seals is the only handymen I trust and use. He has done several jobs for me in the last two years since I moved here. I am very fortunate to have him help me. There are so many scams and bad people out there. Chris does an excellent job, detail oriented, tries to save money the best he can. Chris has helped me through emergencies and always shows up even though he is extremely busy. His skills as an electrician has been amazing in my kitchen in my open cabinets. Chris has the ability to “ work out” problems in my home that I wanted but didn’t think it was possible. Very good work, trustworthy and great pricing!
Awesome, Awesome, awesome! He was fast, professional, and fair. 10/10, will definitely be giving him a call in the future!

I request Chris  Seals to installed 4 poach columns in front of my house and he did an excellent job.  He did everything we agreed upon to complete the job and then some. I strongly recommend him.  I plan to use his services again.
Very good

We have used Chris on numerous jobs over the last few years. He shows up.on time. Does quality work and cleans up when finished. I highly recommend.

David Edmonds
Edmonds Home Improvement

five_star_reviews.text: Paul was quick to arrive after I called him and he quickly took care of our plumbing needs!  Paul has done some plumbing work for us before today and I would definitely recommend him !

Paul is nothing short of professional. Came in to our home twice now to make sure everything was fixed that we needed (our tub knob broke). If we ever have anything else we need plumbing wise, Paul has earned our business! Thank you, again!

Fixed a leaky underground pipe in my front yard quickly and efficiently. Was honest and up front about everything. If you need a plumber for ANYTHING, I recommend this guy. Finding people who do solid work with no nonsense is hard to find so just save yourself the hassel and use these guys!
Paul did a great job fixing water heater. He  responded quickly and scheduled my repair. Repair was completed quickly and correctly. Will definitely recommend him to anyone and everyone.
Extremely fast service, affordable and a very pleasant person.
We were dealing with a heavily leaking tub faucet at a rental property. Paul was quick to answer his phone and get to the property to stop to leak. I will be using him for future jobs.
Great service.  We had a toilet replaced as well as all new knobs for a bathtub.  Great business, very knowledgeable and affordable.  Would highly recommend.
Awesome service. I highly recommend this company.

Paul Evans of LT Drain and Small Repair was able to repair my broken faucet and he also did a great job installing a new faucet.  He was punctual for each visit. His communication skilss are fantastic and he itemizes his invoice in clear detail of what you are charged. He even gives you a warranty on your service.  I give him 5 stars!!!

I also just had him out to replace the toilet in one of my bathrooms and both of the toilets in my mother's house. Top notch work from start to finish.  He does great work and I still give him five stars.

Mr. Paul did an excellent job at a property i had recently moved into, replacing a faulty pipe and valve combo that was leaking and running up quite a water bill. He and his help were punctual and called ahead of our appointment to let me know he was on the way. Quick and efficient, at decent pricing, I will utilize his services again and would highly recommend LT Drain and Small Repair.

Called LT Drain and Small Repair since my regular plumber could not come until tomorrow (my regular plumber recommended TL Drain and Small Repair).  Paul was at my house in less than two hours he was able to retrieve the rag that has been flushed down the commode within a few minutes! YAY!

Paul with LT Drain and small repair came out to an older house I just purchased. I needed some copper pipe and valves replaced under the kitchen sink. His work is very professional and was done in a very timely manner. Very pleased with the service I received from Paul. Definitely would recommend.
If you're seeking a reliable professional to replace your water heater, look no further than Paul Evans. He offers exceptional service and was at my father’s house the day after I called him.
Called them and they were there in a couple of hours and it didn’t take forever to repair the drain.
Paul did a great job very professional and very knowledgeable my wife is very happy with her new sink thanks Paul

LT Drain has done alot of work for Mitiagtion companies in the area with excellent results and completion of jobs in a timely manor.  Highly recommend to use them as they are professional and trust worthy.

Paul with LT Drain and Small Repair was very professional, communicative, knowledgeable and informative. He did testing on our plumbing issue, and was honest with what he thought the issues was. He recommended that we have our septic tank pumped although it was not a service that they could perform. I appreciated the honesty and integrity. We will definitely use them again.

I’d also like to add that I called about 6 companies total. This company could come same day to assess our issue AND had the most reasonable price. This is a wholesome company that cares, and it is apparent to your customers. Thanks again.
Highly recommend! He came out within 45 minutes. Very nice and reasonable. Be sure and give them a call you won’t regret
Paul was able to make it my house quickly and fixed the problem efficiently for a reasonable price. I will definitely be using his services again!

Paul Evans was highly recommended by several people. I called him and he was at my house within the hour to fix an emergency water leak. He did an outstanding job and was very professional. If you need a plumber, i recommend Lt Drain and Small Repair.
We had a leak near our meter by the street and Paul came the next day and fixed it very quickly! I highly recommend him if you need a plumber!

Highly recommended!  We had roots that had grown into our main drain.  Paul communicated with us through each step of the process.  Very professional and gave great advice for future prevention.  Will definitely use him again in the future!

I must say best service I’ve encountered in a while. Very professional explained everything and made sure to find good prices for parts needed. Thank you for everything you have done for my parents 2000% sure I will use again.

Paul was extremely responsive when I contacted him letting him know our toilet was leaking, and he came out the same day within just a few hours and had our new toilet installed. He was professional, super quick, and the new toilet looks great. Highly recommend!

Paul responded quickly when we called. He was in and out and the problem was fixed in no time! He even went above and beyond by cleaning out our tub drain which was extremely full of our daughters hair 🤦🏻‍♀️ I would 10/10 recommend to anyone and while I hope I don’t need him anytime soon… if I find myself in need of a plumber, he will be my first call!!!

Paul did an excellent job!  He arrived at the time he had said he would.  He finished the job of installing an outside hose bib, cleaned up and checked that everything was working properly after he turned the water back on.  He was professional while being very personable!
I highly recommend L T Drain and Small Repair for any plumbing issues or problems you might have.

After several recommendations on Facebook, I decided to go with Paul David Evans with LT Drain and Small Repair to fix my garbage disposal. He was punctual, professional, and extremely knowledgeable. He quickly diagnosed the issue and explained it to me in a way I could understand. The repair was done efficiently, and he made sure everything was working perfectly before leaving. I was particularly impressed with his attention to detail and the cleanliness he maintained throughout the process. I highly recommend him for any of your plumbing needs!
What a great experience with this company. Very professional and did awesome work. I will become a returning customer. Thank you so much!
Very knowledgeable and quick response fixed everything I needed

I made an emergency call to LT Drain after my newly installed toilet was leaking onto my newly installed LVP flooring. ((Someone else had done the installation.)) Paul was willing to come out on a Friday evening to fix a leak caused by this other person's incompetence. Word to the wise - Hire a professional - Call Paul.
Great service! He came out within a day of speaking to me. I’ve been looking for this part for my shower for over a year & he was able to find it & fix it within an hr.
I had a sewer pipe bust Mr Paul was able to come right out and fix the pipe very fast and friendly!!! Will definitely call again!!!
Paul was quick to reply and professional. He fix my issue for a great price. Will use again.
Paul was very knowledgable & worked quickly to repair my shower. Will use in the future
Paul at LT Drain was very professional and fixed our leak quickly. We are very pleased with his work. Highly recommend.
Paul answered right away even though it was after hours. Professional and knowledgeable. Came out and made the necessary repairs quickly. Would definitely recommend!

We have needed LT Drain on several occasions for a variety of things. They have always been prompt, professional and reasonable. I appreciate the excellent service they have given us and am glad to recommend them to anyone
Amazingly fast service, excellent rapport, and an overall great job! Will definitely be my go to plumber for any future needs.  Thank you!
Paul was prompt and efficient. He resolved the issue quickly. Prices were fair. Will definitely recommend and use Lt drain and small repair in the future

LT Drain provided quality affordable plumbing services. Mr. Paul had excellent customer service and fixed the problem I had with 3 toilets that were backed up and not flushing properly. He was patient and went out of his way. I have already scheduled additional repairs with LT Drain and Repair. I would definitely recommend LT Drain and Repair for your plumbing needs!

website_content.aboutUs: At K&K Contracted Services, we are a team of highly skilled and certified plumbers dedicated to providing top-notch plumbing solutions to the Ashville community and surrounding areas. Our expertise lies in emergency services, leak detection, repiping, tankless water heater installation, and drain clearance. With a focus on prompt and reliable service, we strive to be your go-to local plumbing experts.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Experience the peace of mind that comes with our 24/7 emergency plumbing services, delivered by certified professionals.
sellingPoints: Rapid response times for emergencies, ensuring your plumbing issues are addressed promptly.
State-of-the-art equipment and techniques for efficient and long-lasting solutions.
Unwavering commitment to safety, quality, and customer satisfaction on every job.

five_star_reviews.text: Cody was very  professional and did an excellent job! We will never use anyone else! Very prompt and professional work, way beyond our expectations! Thank you so much!
Cody is the absolute best! Comes whenever you need him, wherever you need him. He is kind, professional, and does a perfect job. Wouldn’t trust anyone else!!

Cody was lightning fast coming out! Man he worked his tail off while he was here working on my kitchen sink aerator!! That sink worked like brand new when he got done! I won’t use anybody else ever again!!
Cody is great!  He was quick to get to our problem and figure out exactly what was going on.  He got the parts and got it fixed easily.  Highly Recommend!!
Great service on time and at a good price
Phenomenal service. Issue was fixed in no time. Will 100% use again if needed.

Had full service repair (about 300ft down a hill and through woods) done by Cody. Fantastic service for a very reasonable price.  Stayed working till almost midnight to get it finished.  Came on short notice due to leak. Highly recommend.
Such amazing service!!!! My go to for any all plumbing. Very professional, I recommend for any and all plumbing needs. Roll Tide!

My kitchen and bathroom sink was backing up and I reached out to Cody. Within seconds he called me back and immediately came to check it out! He had it fixed right off the bat and everything is working perfectly now! I can’t believe how perfect of service he provided for us! 10/10 highly recommend him! Sweetest guy ever!

Cody changed 2 drains out in my bathtubs that were difficult to get to. He kept me informed every step of the way as to what was going on with my plumbing, and showed me pictures of what was going on under the house. Really nice man. I feel like I got good value for my money. He was also really patient with my old, cranky dog that hates visitors. He was respectful of my home, he tried his best to keep it clean despite being covered in dirt from crawling under the house. He left his boots outside without me having to ask. I will use this company again in the future for whatever issues may arise.
Cody is truly the kindest most respectful man you’ll ever have work for you! I truly couldn’t recommend him more!
A++ Went the extra mile to get the job done and make sure I was happy!!!
Very prompt, available for same day repair.  Arrived at my house within 1 hour of me calling.  Very professional and great quality work.  Will definitely use again if needed.

I would one thousand percent recommend this business to everybody. Cody came out and fixed a problem with my water filtration system which was affecting the water throughout my home. He was friendly, professional, and he worked super hard to fix our problem. I wouldn't recommend anyone else. Thank you Cody!
Cody and Skylar were amazing I had a pipe bust in my front yard and they came out and replaced my entire water line the next morning from meter to house they are amazing.
Very professional and courteous employees. Cody and his assistants are 5 stars. I would use this company and refer them to my family and friends. Great job guys.!!!!!
Mama's boy was able to arrive quickly and efficiently diagnose and repair our hot water pipe which was leaking inside the wall

My wife Christy and I bought our home 3 years ago. Not being from Ft. Payne we have not yet established professional relationships with contractors in our area.

When our septic pump/system began to fail we were at a loss. The few reputable contractors in . Ft. Payne were unavailable for weeks…

Cody made a trip 70 miles out of his way to come up and check out our problem. He was able to get things to operate until the necessary pump and other necessary materials were secured.

A second trip up from Oxford/Anniston was made. After experiencing some additional issues a third trip was made. The work was completed professionally, confidently and the level of follow through start to finish was impressive.

Our family has found our Plummer/Septic guy for life. Professional attention, attitude while performing this work seemed effortless. The finished product surpassed our expectations. The value of this experience and now knowing that regardless what we might encounter regarding plumbing or septic issues we now have a go to company with excellent personal that we know will be there. We sincerely appreciate a job very well done.

This company offers great service.  Came out the same day my husband called.  Got the repair done in a day. Cody, Skylar and the rest of the crew were very professional.  I will definitely use this company for all my plumbing needs.

Cody and his helper came out on an emergency call, and worked to the we hours of the morning fixing a broken line from the well to the house. They stayed and finished the job to make sure we had water again. I will use and recommend Mama's Boy Plumbing and Septic  again. Thank you Cody.

First thing, I am new to area and have been really disappointed in the service of numerous contractors since moving here.  Well Cody has been an outstanding find. He was on time, which is unthinkable in this area. His expertise and quotes were outstanding. He fixed our septic tank issue, on time, as quoted. I will only call him for my plumbing needs going forward. I feel a lot the contractors in this area could learn from him on how to treat customers.

If you are having septic tank problems, Cody is the man to call.  My lines were blocked and Cody came out the same day I called and had me back up and ready by the end of the day.  Highly recommended!
Cody and his team were great they did MY WHOLE HOUSE and it’s all in great working condition 10 out of 10 thank you Cody 💯

The owner came out and gave us detailed information and quote, he was able to do the work that same day. He was meticulous, fast, responsive, and came in under budget! He was a complete joy to work with and I will definitely be recommending him as well as using him for all my future needs!

These guys are awesome and very knowledgeable! I had a guy from a different company  come out and tell me there was a problem that didn’t exist  and wanted to charge me almost $300 and so these great men came out and just unclogged the drain! I’m so glad they are honest and affordable.

Cody and his team are amazing! They quickly identified the problem. They were able to fix it quickly and efficiently. They keep me updated during the whole process. They go out of their way to have exceptional customer service. I would recommend them to everyone! Thank you guys!
Very Honest and fair company
I would recommend Royal Plumbing to anyone! Chris and crew were super polite and helpful at every point throughout the way.
GREAT PEOPLE TO DO YOUR PLUMBING AND VERY NICE

These guys are Highly recommended for all the right reasons!

This company is the best they do everything they can to save you money plus they do a great job and it is done right. Very good and honest people. We be glad to refer anyone to them. The owner Cody is very helpful and his workers.

They also just felt like the most honest of the choices & we felt most comfortable choosing to hire them for the job. Then, when it came time to do the work, they were fast/efficient, friendly, and the repairs (new fittings & access panel) looked fantastic. Definitely plan on using them for any & all future plumbing needs. Hoping this review saves others the time & effort of shopping around. You can’t go wrong with these guys. 👍👍

I will be referring Royal to everybody I know

Fantastic work at fantastic prices. Highly recommend.

the guys at Royal plumbing are super professional and very knowledgeable!! Highly recommend!

five_star_reviews.text: This review is about the owner. I called about an issue we were having and the owner informed me he was out of town with family and the rest of his team was booked, but he gave me the names of 3 other plumbers he recommends.  He could have just said he was unavailable and ended the call, but he still tried to help. That level of professionalism should be the norm, but sadly, is not. It was probably a small thing to him, but meant a lot to me.

We used Hatcher plumbing for a total revamp of our 1960’s house’s plumbing. He gutted the old drains and replaced all of the cast iron with a completely redesigned pvc drain system all the way to the septic tank.  He designed a new vent system so that no pipes would show up through the roof sections at the front of the house. He also created a new water supply system throughout the house using PEX. He even replaced some pvc on our pool pump! Sims gave a lot of great advice along the way and helped us overcome several obstacles in our remodeling. We will be having him return shortly to hook up all of the fixtures as soon as the drywall is complete. Sims is very personable and passionate about doing quality work.  Hatcher Plumbing has done us a fantastic service!
Very professional and quality work! If you want a bad plumber Mr. Hatcher ain't it. Hes a good plumber with good work ethic, I definitely recommend him!
Great service

five_star_reviews.text: Hobbs is by far one of the best companies we have ever worked with. They're responsive, professional, incredibly knowledgeable, and affordable. I'd give them 10 stars if I could! We will be calling them for all of our plumbing and gas needs! Brittany, Wade, and Blake were all so wonderful!
Excellent work today on gas line issue. Will use again, very professional

They were simply fantastic in every way!! I was visiting from out of town to help my son, who is a student at Auburn, get some repairs finished at his home. They were extremely responsive and prompt with the plumbing work I needed accomplished. They also went above and beyond by helping me find someone who could do some flooring work, after several failed attempts from myself to get the work done.

Blake, Wade and Brittany are the best!

Very Professional and Very nice people!

Answered all my concerns, fixed all issues and disposed of old materials.

What a great Plumbing Company!

Thanks to you all at Hobbs Plumping.

Extremely pleased with our experience!  We needed a cartridge replaced in our bathtub faucet, but we couldn't get the old cartridge out.  Brittany was kind and helpful on the phone and was able to send someone out very quickly.  Bryan was so polite and friendly and efficient!  He did a fantastic job explaining why it was stuck, what he was doing, and the potential issues they could run into.  They prepared me for the worst but delivered the best!  Completed the whole project, including travel time to get the replacement part, in an hour and a half.  Would definitely recommend Hobbs!!

Bryan relocated our PRV near our water meter instead of at our house in the crawl space. I’m very pleased with the service we received. I will definitely  will use Hobbs Plumbing when needed again.

Bryan arrived and fixed the problem and some others he found. Thank you Bryan for being so helpful and courteous. Would highly recommend Hobbs Plumbing if you have a plumbing issue.

"I would highly recommend Hobbs Plumbing LLC, to anyone in the Auburn/Opelika/Lee County area. I was out searching for a plumber to do some repairs at a rental property of mine . website_content.aboutUs: Shamrock Home Repairs is a trusted local plumbing and home repair company serving the Huntsville, AL area. Our team of skilled professionals specializes in a wide range of services including plumbing, roofing, electrical work, and door replacements. With a focus on quality workmanship and customer satisfaction, we are committed to providing exceptional service to homeowners throughout Huntsville, Madison, Hazel Green, and surrounding communities.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Experience the peace of mind that comes with choosing Huntsville's premier plumbing and home repair experts.
sellingPoints: Fully licensed and insured professionals with extensive knowledge of local building codes and regulations.
Comprehensive range of services from plumbing and roofing to electrical work and handyman repairs, all under one roof.
Commitment to using high-quality materials and employing proven techniques to ensure long-lasting solutions.

### Business Information:

#### Alabama Business Registration/License Details
While the specific details of Shamrock Home Repairs' business registration or licenses in Alabama are not provided in the sources, it is clear that any business operating in Huntsville, AL, would need to comply with local and state regulations. For instance, businesses in Alabama typically need to register with the Alabama Secretary of State and obtain necessary local business licenses, as indicated in general business license requirements[1].

#### Physical Location and Service Areas
Shamrock Home Repairs is located at 138 Rose Dr, Huntsville, AL 35811. The business serves several areas including Huntsville, Madison, Hazel Green, New Market, Gurley, Toney, and Meridianville[5].

#### Hours and Payment Methods
There is no specific information available on the business hours or payment methods for Shamrock Home Repairs.

The exact years in operation for Shamrock Home Repairs are not specified in the provided sources. However, the BBB file for the business was opened on May 6, 2021, which suggests it has been operating at least since then[2].

Shamrock Home Repairs offers a wide range of services including handyman work, home repairs, plumbing, roofing, light to moderate electrical work, and door replacement[5].

### Customer Reviews & Reputation:

#### Review Summaries with Specific Examples
The reviews for Shamrock Home Repairs are largely negative, particularly those found on the BBB website. Customers have reported issues such as poor work quality, unprofessional behavior, and failure to address customer complaints. For example, one customer reported that the company did a shoddy job on their chimney repair, leading to significant damage and safety issues[3].

#### BBB Rating and Status
Shamrock Home Repairs is not BBB accredited and does not have a BBB rating due to being out of business according to the BBB profile[2].

#### Common Customer Feedback Themes
Common themes include poor workmanship, unprofessional behavior of technicians, failure to complete jobs as promised, and lack of response to customer complaints[3].

#### Response to Reviews
The business has not responded to the complaints filed on the BBB website, as indicated by the status of the complaints being "unanswered"[3].

### Owner & Staff:

five_star_reviews.text: After being quoted by two well known roofing companies that I needed a new roof,  Raymond was able to find the leak and fixed the problem.  What he thought was initially the problem he later discovered was a short cut the builder had done to the roof and fixed that problem as well.  I would definitely recommend Raymond and would use again.

Built a beautiful deck for our 1958 bungalow. Every old house comes with special surprises; Shamrock upgraded our old porch foundation and redesigned the existing structure to suit our needs, without charging extra for the additional work. We’re so pleased with the results!

Mr. Roop was hired to finish some renovations to several posts on my front porch, back patio, and shed. He did a great job despite several issues that made the job difficult and unique. He remained patient with changes I made mid-way through the job and made several trips to pick up materials needed.  He was very polite and patient and was very flexible with his schedule to accommodate me. He stayed within budget which was very reasonable.
