five_star_reviews.text: Excellent! Quality and pride in work! Organized and courteous! Clear communication and great follow through! 17 yo hot water heater replaced within 24 hours of initial call! Very fair price. God blessed us with finding Anything Plumbing!

Anytime and everytime we've called upon Anything Plumbing, they've answered and did the jobs quickly and at a reasonable cost. Today, with a full schedule, they were able to fit us in between calls and explained to us what we needed to do since he didn't have my particular part on his truck. We were able to get the part that night and fix it because of his instructions. If we couldn't get the part, he was coming back to fix it in the morning. They will continue to get my business each and every time because they treat us like they want our business and not like they are looking to get rich off of a job. If you are looking for reasonable and reliable, I recommend using Anything Plumbing.
Awesome service, fast repair, arrived asap and fixed a few other issues along the way. Repeat customer, my go to plumbing expert! Highly reccomended.

Update: second time using this wonderful company. They were able to replace our water heater quickly and did an excellent job. 10/10 on skill and service

So thankful for Jarrett! He was so kind and professional, and he was able to help us with a pretty big water leak. Will definitely recommend to friends

Highly recommend Anything Plumbing! We had a leak in an unknown location. They came out quickly and found and repaired the leak quickly.  They were also much more thorough and affordable than another plumber we had out previously. They took great care in ensuring our yard was kept neat and clean throughout the process. Anything Plumbing will be the first people we call for future plumbing needs.

Anything Plumbing replaced our water heater.They were able to readily schedule our appointment, arrived promptly, were pleasant, communicative, skilled, and efficient.  They charged a fair price for good honest work. Will call again for future plumbing needs.

Has been able to show up and take care of any problem I've had on our properties within a very reasonable amount of time. And the follow through was fantastic, never had to recall for a job, done first time every time.

Awesome performance by AP!  Tremendous knowledge, very friendly, extremely good communication, punctual, and a work ethic second to none.  AP did more than they promised and all the work was high quality.  Highly recommend!!
Great service, very professional, and reasonably priced! Will definitely be using for future needs!
Jarrett completed the job quickly and professionally. All the feeling and benefit of a small business and personal attention. I highly recommend AP.
Jarrett came out on a Sunday to repair supply line to kitchen sink. He was on time, professional, courteous, and performed quality work! It was a positive experience and I would recommend.
Great customer service and top quality plumbing work.

This is the first time I've used Anything Plumbing and they surpassed my expectations with their professionalism and quality of work. Thank you!

Sincerely,

A lifetime customer

Jarrett at Anything Plumbing was very professional from start to finish. He gave me a 45 minute heads up of when he would be there which gave me time to get home to meet him. He was very thorough with his troubleshooting and quickly figured out my issue. Not only was he quick to figure it out but he had my pressure regulator valve replaced and the hot water heater leak repaired in just under 2 hours. I wouldn't hesitate to call him again in the future with any plumbing needs. Thanks Jarrett!

I called Anything plumbing on a Sunday evening and he was very helpful over the phone. He came out first thing Monday morning. Fixed my slap leak in a few hours. He even filled hole with concrete. Jarrett did a wonderful job. Would highly recommend. Thank you Anything Plumbing for getting my family water again!

Responded quickly. Came out same day I called, Monday. Was back on Wednesday to replace 17 year old water heater. Updated the plumbing as well as installed Rheeme 50 gallon. Price was very reasonable, less than other quote we got and certainly more expedient. They were professional, responsive and really nice people. I highly recommend Anything Plumbing.

Had a heating element die in my tankless water heater. Was absolutely a consummate professional and was even early for the service call. His pricing was fair and he did a wonderful job. This is the guy. I'm definitely going to be calling in the future!

We have no regrets calling Anything Plumbing. They did a great job replacing our hot water heater for a reasonable price. We definitely recommend Anything Plumbing if you want a plumber you can trust. We would call again for any future plumbing needs.
They are very professional, knowledgeable and reliable. We highly recommend their business and would definitely use them again.
Very professional and answered all my questions. Quality work. Certainly would recommend.

Jarrett was great. He was able to help us the same day and gave me directions over the phone of what to do until he got to the house. He was quick and professional. We would definitely recommend Anything Plumping and use them again.
Jared is a smart guy who I respect for his professional services. I can always rely on him to shoot me straight.
Quick response, good price, professional, friendly team.  I recommend anything plumbing.

My hot water heater was running constantly. Called Jarrett at anything plumbing and he was over the next day. He found the leak and fixed the issue quickly and even fixed a thermostat issue with my hot water heater. I asked him for more work and he showed up when he said he would and did professional work and was courteous the whole time. Im not looking forward to more plumbing issues in the future but i would easily feel comfortable calling him for all my plumbing. A+
Replaced both washing machine fill faucets. Did a great job installing and cleaning after completion. Will definitely use again and highly recommend to anyone needing fast quality service.
Excellent work.
Our “go to” people for plumbing. Always responsive, on time and very knowledgeable. Reasonable costs.  Would highly recommend for anything plumbing!

Jarrett came to my home yesterday to fix a small plumbing problem.  I'd already had 2 different contractors try and fix it to no avail. Jarrett identified the problem immediately and replaced what was broken so now I have a functioning bathroom sink. He was polite and professional and also a clean worker. I will definitely use him again.

I called a number of plumbing companies within 20 miles of my location before I select it anything plumbing. It turned out to be a wise choice. I had same day service and the repairman was friendly, fast and efficient. The repair bill was well below what all of the other companies quoted. I highly recommend this company for your plumbing needs.

I had to get a water pressure regulator replaced at my residence. They were great . Very Professional and worked promptly to fix my problem. I would definitely recommend there service.  Fair pricing and great work.

This is an Incredible company to work with. If you have plumbing issues, call Anything Plumbing! They were extremely responsive, worked within my schedule and focused on providing high quality work. I can honestly say I have never experienced better customer service than Anything Plumbing. On top of that, they do top quality work. They have a customer for life!

I didn't hesitate to call Jarrett back for my second plumbing problem this month. Both times he was courteous, responsive, on-time, and professional. Prices are reasonable and he cleans up after the job. Hopefully, I won't need repairs again for a while but if I do, I will call on Anything Plumbing.

I have used Anything Plumbing three different times for various problems. Each time I have been extremely satisfied with their service and the work they completed. Jarrett is professional in all regards. Each time I have received quality work in a timely manner at a fair price. I will continue to use Anything Plumbing for all my plumbing needs and highly recommend them to others.

Jarrett is exceptional! Came over early to get the job done and done well. Installed a garbage disposal and fixed our drips in each bathroom. Personable, reliable, kind, and honest. I would highly recommend Anything Plumbing. Thank you Jarrett and wife (whom we didn't catch her name), you did a great job!!

I highly recommend this company. If you find yourself in need of plumbing services don't hesitate to use them. I'm the owner of a service company, and one of my employees accidently cut through a waterline at our customer's home. Jarrett arrived quickly (got there earlier than when he said he would). Jarrett was extremely professional. I can attest that he is highly skilled & a very knowledgeable plumber. He worked fast and did a great job cleaning up after the repair was made. Nothing short of an excellent job! I will most definitely use them again if I have plumbing needs.
A+. I appreciated their professionalism. They got right to work and got the job done quickly. Would call them again. Thanks again and have a good day!

My Garbage disposal started leaking and making quite a mess under the kitchen sink.  In the past, I read many favorable reviews about Jarrett and Anything Plumbing from a web-site called "My Neighborhood".  I decided to call Anything Plumbing and give them a try.  Jarrett arrived the next day exactly at the appointed time.  He had everything he needed to compete the task with him.  He explained to me why the original configuration of discharge piping (dishwasher as well as the garbage disposal) were not optimal and changed them to both look and function better.  He also installed a new garbage disposal.  All of this was completed in less than 1.5 hours and at an expense that was much less than I had anticipated (I've lived at this location over thirty years and had other plumbing issues).  Needless to say, I'm very impressed with Anything Plumbing and they are in my contacts folder.  Jarrett will be coming back in the near future to replace an old Shower valve for me.
Punctual, professional, and competent. I will use them again if I have plumbing needs.  Same day service in my case!

This duo of plumbers is bar none the best you'll find in the Huntsville area. I highly recommend you call up Jarrett for your plumbing needs. He came next day to replace a water heater, which led to a leaking hot water line fix and a hose bib replacement. He was thorough and accurate when cutting the drywall and replaced with patches that look very professional. He clearly explained what he was doing and showed me how he was going to do it. Please do yourself a favor and look no further than Anything Plumbing!

I am very pleased with the service.  When we were talking pricing before he started, he laid out several possibilities of problems with varying impact on cost.  He only repaired what he needed to and the cost was contained.  I know that if he wanted to be shady he could have been.  The opportunity was there, but I really am thankful that honest guys like Jaritt are out there.

On the technical side of details, my outdoor hose bib was leaking and has been since the house was purchased last year.  The home inspector identified high water psi, and also the leaking hose bib.  The inspectors said you should probably request a pressure regulator on your house, it is very high.  I decided not to request a pressure regulator but I did request the hose bib be fixed.  Long story short is, it was not fixed.

As it got closer to winter I started worrying about water freezing around the wet ground where it leaks and then messing up my foundation so I called Jaritt.

At the end of the service Jaritt tells me that he did not need to install a psi regulator because the psi was normal now and then explained that the city had fixed the issue in my neighborhood.  So there was opportunity there to jack the price.  But he was honest and I am appreciative.  Definitely recommend.

I called Wednesday afternoon about 3:00 and they came the next day on Thursday at 12:00 before they came they gave me a call to make sure that  I was expecting them they got right to the job and did it right very nice to have a prompt plumber.

Jarrett, was very professional, and provided services the very next day. He replaced two shower cartridges at a very affordable price! Anything Plumbing also provided a very reasonable estimate to remodel the bathroom/shower that adheres to Veterans Administration Standards for home improvement. Great job! Highly recommended.
I've been using Anything Plumbing for my plumbing needs for years now and they have always been good to me. They are honest, kind, and best of all they do great work!

We had a “water” leak, in the yard and after a couple of days of trying to decide if it was our neighbors or ours! We found it was ours, we then spent the next two days waiting on another plumbing company, that first called to come at 8 pm, to work in the yard. Too late to dig and see outside.They then didn’t show up by 5 the next day, when we called , couldn’t say when they were going to get to us.
So we moved on to Anything Plumbing, Jarrett and crew, showed up on time, diagnosed the problem, fixed it, and seemed fair in the price.  Not a big name brand, but I’d call him again before I’d call the others. Oct2019
Very professional, trustworthy, honest, and do very neat, professional job.
Completely professional, prices are the best I know of, on time (early, even), and will clearly explain all the issues before and during the work. HIGHLY recommend.

I had a main water pipe leak that Jarrett and team fixed after having three other plumbers come out and repair previously within two years of our newly built home. Jarrett located the problem and no issues since. I called him back to install new hammered bathroom sinks today and they did a Beautiful job!!! So Pleased with their work and prices. Very Reasonable and Knowledgeable!!! Thank you!!

Found out this afternoon that we had a water leak on our side of the meter.  Jarrett was on-site within a couple of hours, worked through the rain and had us fixed up same day.  Great work and great attitude!

Had major water leak out by my water meter. They got to me pretty quick, and did a excellent job on the repair. Job well done at a resonable fee. If you want a job done by a local plumber I highly recommend Anything Plumbing for the job.

I'd never met Jarrett but he was recommended to me.  I called in the morning and he offered to be at my house in the early afternoon. He diagnosed my problem--a broken pipe in my yard that was showing no obvious signs on the surface--dug 3.5' down,  and repaired the damage.  He was courteous, respectful, and made me feel I could trust him.  I'll use him again.  I recommend him without reservation.

I have used Anything Plumbing twice this month.  The quality of Jarrett's work is exceptional.  He arrives at the time stated and makes sure that everything is running perfectly before he leaves your home.
JUST purchased a home, he repaired my issue same day. VERY nice, VERY good work! And his prices beat others! I will use again!  Thank you!!!
Very fast and professional, very reasonable! Will use them from here on out.
Called Anything Plumbing about my tub faucet. Jarrett came out and took a look to see what my problem was. He fixed it in no time and was a reasonable price! Will call again!
I had a water line leaking and called them. They showed up the same day and had it fixed. Would definitely recommend.

I have used Anything Plumbing twice within the past year.  Once for a pressure relief valve by the City Meter and also a leaking shower mixing valve.  My mother has also used Anything Plumbing.  The service was quick and professional.   The fixes were repaired professionally and I have had no further problems since the time of repair.

I have used Anything Plumbing for 3 plumbing jobs over the last 7 years.  Each time I was very pleased with the quality of work performed by Jarrett.  Anything Plumbing's service was prompt and professional.  The expense for each job was also very reasonable.  Highly recommended!!
Great work! Friendly and professional.

five_star_reviews.text: They did our septic,water, pad and gravel driveway. They do very good clean work and show up when They say.

Pickle did an amazing job for us. We called about a problem with our septic tank. They came out within 2 hours, and did a great job! Another company was going to charge us more and were going to take another day to come out.
Very helpful and understanding people unlike others the could have tried to get over but never attempted and gave advice on ways to solve problems on my on thanks a lot we will continue to use them

These guys came out and repaired my septic system after another company tried up selling to all new field lines to the tune of $4k+. They looked at our system and after giving them the go ahead came out and repaired the very next day. No need to replace field lines. We’re very appreciative of their honesty and prompt response to our inquiry. Thanks guys!

Mr Pickle came out when he said he would and banged out our new septic install. Very professional and quality team from his wife in the office to his helpers!  Some small damage occurred when he was digging a massive rock out of the septic hole and he came out immediately to repair and make the neighbors happy.  Highly recommend!
Perfect service.  On time and professional.

These guys are the best! After the first company showed and tried to upcharge for unnecessary work, after the second company showed up and damaged the septic tank and lid by dropping tye lid into the tank and lied about it Pumped, I contacted Charles Pickle Sepric Tank Service. These guys knew exactly what they were doing and were honest and upfront the entire process. They pumped and inspected septic tank! No upcharges no dishonesty! They maintained communication at all times. They arrived on schedule. Not only did they pump and inspect, these guys repaired the damaged cause by the previous companies. Thank you to Crystal, Justin, Jeremy and everyone involved. I highly recommend!
I called late Friday and  they came the next day on a Saturday . I was very pleased with the service. They were very knowledgeable and kind.  I will definitely use them again.

I had to do a lot of work with the Health Dept in order to get my tank moved for a pool and Justin went above and beyond to help make this happen and did a great job putting a new tank in and removing the old tank!!!

Very fast and professional service. Was able to fix the problem with my septic tank and then fixed a drain problem in the shower. They had some of the best rates when I called around. I would highly recommend them to anyone. A+++

Very quick and professional, they were even able to help me troubleshoot issues with my drains that didn’t directly relate to my septic tank. Excellent service and would definitely hire them again if I need my tank serviced.

After 30 years working with Building Inspection Services you want a good quality job with an inspection report approves. Justin is highly trained with the expertise to meet all the code requirements. I highly recommend calling Justin with Charles Pickle Septic Service for all your. Septic needs.
I highly recommend Pickle Plumbing for all your plumbing needs. I have used their services on multiple occasions. Nothing but speedy, professional service.
Hard worker Johnathan Pickle is
Great customer service and service
Always on time and gets the job done fast.

five_star_reviews.text: Identified problem and fixed my toilet. Quick and efficient. Did not leave a mess.
Great job resolving my plumbing issues!

Christian is the man!  I had a septic system right on a fence line that needed to be removed and have a new one put in a few feet away.  Stain rocked it so fast and profesh.  Within a couple days they had pulled the permit, dug the hole put the new tank in and had everything up and running again.  They even moved the junction box up onto the house instead of out in the grass where it got damaged last time and closed the permit right away.  Pricing is super fair and they go above and beyond.  Thanks you guys!!!!!

Very Professional!!! We had an issue with our septic system causing a backup. The tech quickly diagnosed the problem with a simple solution not requiring the tank to be pumped unlike the "big named company" which pumped the tank and ran a year and a half ago. I highly recommend Stain Plumbing!!!

I had two different plumbers come to my house to fix my sink's water pressure without any solution. Stain plumbing was able to identify the problem and fix it right away getting me a new faucet in a timely manner. They know what they're doing, very responsive, do quality work and were a pleasure to work with.

Those guys were really excellent to work with. I called them the night before with my problem and they promised to get it taken  care of the first thing the next morning and they did an awesome job. I highly recommended

Christian and his team at Stain Plumbing and Construction are excellent to work with. I've used them several times for plumbing needs and they are very dependable and provide top notch quality work. Give Christian a call or text for all your plumbing needs. I've never been disappointed.

sandsplumbingservice.name: S&S Plumbing Service

website_content.aboutUs: At S&S Plumbing Service, we are a team of highly skilled and experienced plumbers dedicated to providing top-notch service to the Birmingham community. Our expertise spans a wide range of plumbing services, from routine maintenance and repairs to complex installations and trenchless sewer line replacements. We specialize in utilizing state-of-the-art equipment and techniques, ensuring efficient and reliable solutions for all your plumbing needs.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Experience the peace of mind that comes with choosing a trusted local plumbing company committed to delivering exceptional service and long-lasting solutions.
sellingPoints: Licensed and certified by the State of Alabama Plumbers & Gas Fitters Examining Board, ensuring compliance with industry standards and regulations.
Rapid response times and same-day service for emergencies, minimizing disruptions and potential damage to your property.
Specialized expertise in trenchless lead service line replacement, providing a cost-effective and minimally invasive solution for aging infrastructure.

sandsplumbingservice.research:
### Business Information:

**Alabama Business Registration/License Details:**
- S&S Plumbing Service is registered with the State of Alabama Plumbers & Gas Fitters Examining Board, with a license number of MP-2735[1][4].

**Physical Location and Service Areas:**
- The business is located at 420 20th St N, STE 2200, Birmingham, AL 35203. It serves both residential and commercial customers in the Birmingham area and possibly surrounding regions, though specific service areas are not detailed[1][2].

**Hours and Payment Methods:**
- The hours of operation are not explicitly stated in the available sources. However, the business can be contacted via phone at (205) 862-4220 for inquiries and appointments. Payment methods are also not specified[1][2].

**Years in Operation:**
- S&S Plumbing Service has been in business since February 1, 2014, making it approximately 11 years old as of 2025[1].

### Services & Specialties:

**Types of Services Offered:**
- The business provides a wide range of plumbing services including plumbing fixture installation, plumbing repair, sink installation, drain cleaning, clogged toilet repair, sewer cleaning, sewer repair, water heater installation and repair, water leak detection, and leak repair. They also specialize in trench-less lead service replacement and use high-quality equipment from Rheem[1][2].

**Service Areas Covered:**
- While the specific service areas are not detailed, the business is based in Birmingham and likely serves the surrounding areas.

**Emergency Service Availability:**
- The business offers same-day repairs in most cases, indicating availability for emergency services[5].

- The sources do not provide specific prices or rates for the services offered. However, it is mentioned that they offer "fair prices" and "reasonable service rates"[5].

### Customer Reviews & Reputation:

**Review Summaries with Specific Examples:**
- Although the specific review content is not provided in the sources, the business has a 4.7-star rating based on 95 reviews, indicating a generally positive reputation.

**BBB Rating and Status:**
- S&S Plumbing Service is not a BBB Accredited Business and has a BBB rating of C+. The rating is due to a failure to respond to one complaint filed against the business[1].

**Common Customer Feedback Themes:**
- While specific themes are not detailed, the overall positive rating suggests satisfaction with the services provided.

**Response to Reviews:**
- There is no information available on how the business responds to reviews, particularly in relation to the complaint that affected their BBB rating[1].

### Owner & Staff:

**Owner/Management Information:**
- The owner of S&S Plumbing Service is Mr. Marty Strickland. He is also listed as the principal contact and customer contact for the business[1].

**Staff Qualifications:**
- The technicians at S&S Plumbing Service are experienced and continuously trained on the latest plumbing technology, equipment, and techniques[2].

**Professional Certifications:**
- The business is licensed by the State of Alabama Plumbers & Gas Fitters Examining Board, and Mr. Marty Strickland, as the Principal Master, is responsible for ensuring the company meets the necessary certification and registration requirements[1][4].

five_star_reviews.text: Highly recommend!  Marty was punctual and took care of all the plumbing jobs around the house. He was here for a leak, but completed three other jobs while here. Great customer service and communication!
Marty was on time and reliable. He explained everything he was doing and answered all my questions. Great customer service

You don’t realize how much you need hot water until you don’t have it. S&S was quick to respond and worked me into their schedule the same day. Thanks S&S! I would absolutely use again and would recommend.
Marty was extremely prompt and very helpful as well as knowledgeable! Will call again if needed

I was very pleased on how swiftly they responded to my plumbing emergency. The technician was very  knowledgeable in his area of expertise  and had my issue resolved in a very timely manner.  Thank you S&S PLUMBING!!

My experience with Marty at S&S Plumbing was excellent. He made the extra effort to take care of the water heater leak. Marty also took the time to explain and offer solutions to another issue. He is one of those people who makes the effort to satisfy his customer. I very highly recommend Marty and S&S Plumbing.

My experience with Marty at S&S Plumbing was excellent. He made the extra effort to replace our broken water heater in an expedited way. He worked with the home warranty people to get their approval to replace our heater on the same day as his first visit. On the installation visit he overcame unforseen problems to get our heater in and working so we could avoid another cold shower. Marty is one of those people who goes to any extra effort to satisfy his customer. I very highly recommend Marty and S&S Plumbling.

I am so pleased with the work done l give S&S Plumbing Service a 5 star. Great work and great person. Sorry l hit the stars before l read it. 5 stars is what he deserves.
.
Very pleased!!!

I recently had the pleasure of engaging S&S Plumbing Service for some repairs in my home, and I must say the experience exceeded my expectations.  Marty, the owner,  personally handled the task of replacing my sink faucet and repairing my garbage disposal.

Not only did Marty complete the repairs efficiently,  but he also went above and beyond to ensure everything was in perfect perfect working order before he left. The quality of his workmanship speaks volumes about his dedication to excellence, but what really set him apart was his patience and willingness to to address all my inquiries.

In summary,  I can't recommend S&S Plumbing Service highly enough. Marty's professionalism, friendliness,  and attention to detail make him standout in the industry. If you're in need of plumbing services, look no further. You won't be disappointed! Thanks Marty!
Great job for a great price, and Marty has great taste in music, too! Will definitely call S&S again in the future.
Great work as always! S&S and Marty are the best!
Marty was very accommodating and was willing to communicate on the weekend! The SAME DAY I submitted my service request he reached out to me to schedule my appointment. Highly recommended!
Highly recommend! Marty came out super quick and fixed multiple issues in my house in record time. I couldn’t be happier with my experience.
Nice, did the job quickly and well.  Will definitely use Marty in the future.  Great guy!
Awesome job! Hats off to Marty Strickland for great and timely work, Big Thanks 👍🏽
Best plumbing service!  Super nice and polite and always does A plus work!!
Very easy to work with, reliable and quality work.

My service was arranged through my home warranty company, and I was very pleased! Marty let me know when he was on his way and exactly what time I could expect him. I had a leaky valve on my water heater, and he had it replaced within minutes. I would not hesitate to highly recommend him for any of your plumbing needs.

S&S was sent through our home warranty for a service call on our kitchen sink drain that was leaking. Marty arrived promptly and replaced the old fittings in no time. Kind and professional. Would recommend for future plumbing issues.
I have used S and S a couple of times through our home warranty. The most recent time, I needed a new water heater. Marty came and replaced my water heater quickly, cleanly, and professionally.

Marty was flexible and easy to communicate with on scheduling our repair through our home warranty service. He did a great job with replacing our old, heavy, broken pipe, and he cleaned up afterwards. Would not hesitate to use his services in the future!

Marty was very helpful. He answered all my questions and checked anything I was concerned about. Gave me tips to keep my water heater running well and what to look out for. Very friendly and professional guy, would recommend.

Marty was excellent. He did a great job fixing our hot water heater. He also took the time to show me how to drain and properly maintain the hot water heater. He was fun to chat with while he worked and was very knowledgeable. I would definitely recommend him to anyone.
Marty was very friendly and worked me in on his schedule ahead of time. He figured out our problem quickly and had the shower fixed within 20 minutes.  Highly recommend!
First time having Marty with S&S out here for us and he didn’t disappoint. Very polite and is an expert in his field. We’ll definitely be reaching out to him in the future!
Marty came out and fixed a hole in my drywall that a precious company failed to finish. Came when he said he would and was on time. Good guy, and a professional! Will use him in the future!
S&S Plumbing did an excellent job with installing my new hot water heater. The communication and responsiveness was out of this world. Everyone needs a Marty at S&S for their plumbing services.

Marty was so professional, yet friendly. Kept  me updated on service times/arrivals. Was able to diagnose and make the repair on the same visit. I will definitely use his company again for plumbing repairs.
Marty was a joy to work with! Great communication skills and was able to fit us in with our not so flexible work schedule. Will use him again and highly recommend!
My service provider made sure i was fully informed. He was polite, friendly, and professional.
Very friendly to work with,  explained everything well,  and got the job done in a timely manner. I appreciate Marty handling this and taking care of my water leak issue.

Marty is awesome! I had an issue with a leak from the garage.  I  was very concerned because I could see the water through the bricks and was afraid my water bill was going to sky rocket.  Marty was contacted that evening and worked me in to his very busy schedule the next day.  He showed us what created the leak, repaired the leak, and was so courteous and professional.  I truly appreciate his understanding of my situation and the worry it caused.  He not only fixed the leak, but relieved my anxiety.   I highly recommend S&S plumbing and will trust them with any future plumbing needs.
Great work, Marty.  Appreciate your Professionalism and skill.

Marty Strickland did a phenomenal job. Above and beyond even took time to teach me exactly what he was doing while he did it! Very thankful for a good experience and recommend him highly. Also doesn’t hurt that he’s a funny guy as well!

This company was fantastic. We had a different company come out and did a very poor job on our toilet. These guys came out and did a very thorough job the right way and completely fixed our toilet. Showed us what went wrong and fixed it. It works better now than when we first moved in. Couldn’t recommend them more.

Nicholas and Chris did a great job fixing a leak in the main water line outside of my home. They were able to fit me into the schedule several days sooner than anyone else I talked with, and they were helpful to inform me of known and unknown potential expenses. When the details of a home warranty company came into play, they gave me some input and time to sort out the specifics in order to minimize the cost I had to bear. Nicholas even gave me some great guidance without hesitation on a few smaller plumbing projects I hoped to undertake by myself in the future. When dealing with something as important as water lines, I would much rather hire someone who does quality work than someone who just "gets it done" for cheap. Nevertheless, I felt like their service was a solid value and would absolutely call them again. The peace of mind of knowing a licensed pro completed the job and will stand by their work is worth a LOT. I would absolutely recommend S&S and Nicholas especially.

Marty was great, he fixed a valve issue, checked my other valves to make sure they were ok, changed out several faucets. He was quick and efficient. Will definitely call him again and cannot recommend him highly enough

Nicholas and his team are intelligent and generous professionals who clearly know their trade. During a leak detection service call, they went so far as to re-caulk certain tub fixtures while outright replacing a rusty old pipe that sent orange water into the bath when turned on. These additional touches weren't part of the service, but Nicholas quickly offered (without our asking) to replace and seal these fixtures as merely part of his visit. After trying other, bigger-name plumbing companies in the area, S&S was clearly the winner. Do yourself a favor and hire these plumbers if you want the job done thoroughly, correctly, and without a price tag that'll make you faint.
Such wonderful and timely service!  Professional, quick, things work now!  Thank you!!!!!

They answered the first time I called, and made time to come to my house and fix my water heater the next day (during the week of Christmas). My water heater is working better than when I first got it. Definitely will use them for all of my plumbing needs!
S&S Plumbing was great fixing my kitchen sink. They came quick and we’re very professional.

Marty has done work for us multiple times, and all of his work has been above and beyond just the bare minimum. Hes very professional and up front about any costs etc., as well as friendly and easy to work with. I would absolutely recommend him to anyone that needs top quality work
Very professional and did excellent work

We had a leaky shower head that needed to be rebuilt. The service was professional, timely, and very reasonable. After getting a rate that was entirely to high by a different company, we turned to S & S. They will be our sole provider to fix any plumbing issues that may come up in the future. It is a relief to find a high quality, reasonable, honest plumbing service in the Birmingham Area.

Thanks Marty / Nicholas!
I can’t say enough good things about Nicholas Lyons! He was professional, personable, intelligent and completed our job in a timely and efficient manner! I’ll be calling him again in the future!

Nick was the person that handled our service, and he was awesome. Throughout the process he communicated well and explained what he was doing as he was doing it. I highly recommend using this company for your plumbing needs.

Nick showed up on time to install our recirculating pump. He explained what he was going to do and was very professional.  We now have hot water in seconds instead of waiting 5 minutes. My wife is elated. We are not wasting gallons of water waiting on it to get hot now.

I have used S&S Plumbing several times. They have always been very professional, prompt, and cost effective. Their work was has always been done right. Nick is great at his job. Very knowledgeable and professional. I will continue to use S&S for all my plumbing needs because I trust them.
They are always timely, professional, and provide a quality service. 5 Stars!! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

Our water heater went out flooding our downstairs.  S&S Plumbing responded quickly and repaired the problem.  They replaced the water heater and pressure regulator correcting the problem.  The price was reasonable.  S&S worked with our home warranty to cover part of the repairs.

We had a handful of minor issues in the older home we just bought (no hot water in shower, slow draining shower, toilet that wouldn't stop running).  Marty came out on time and quickly and efficiently fixed all our pesky problems.  He even went above and beyond and tightened up a loose shower door and double checked the hot water temperature setting to make sure the kids shower wouldn't get too hot . Not only will I call S&S Plumbing for future issues but I'll also recommend them without reservation to friends.

This company is awesome! Shout out to Nicholas, the amazing plumber, for being so knowledgeable, punctual, tidy, and respectful of our home.

The office staff is also kind and professional.

We would recommend this company to anyone and everyone!
Nicholas showed up on time and went over and above! He took the time to explain the issues to us and got right to work! Highly recommend them for any plumbing needs!

Given the issue may be a full blown water replacement, Nicholas replaced the drain valve which was part of my dripping leak issue but sadly it still has a slight drip coming from somewhere else (that is not an easy patch). Eventually it will need a full replacement but given the renovation crew that redid this house for a broker did such a terrible job with gas lines surrounding the water heater, it was going to be a costly out of pocket replacement due to access issues. We’re holding off until it’s a must and will get things taken care of through our home warranty group. So, I do recommend S&S but I just hope you’re situation is easier to review than mine.
Thank you S & S Plumbing  for coming to my rescue. In a time of an emergency, you delivered.  A very nice, friendly, professional  staff. Nicholas  did a very good job. Thank you Nicholas.

Nicholas was very helpful! He was called to my home to repair a plumbing/water heater issue, but it turned out that the HVAC condensation pipe was clogged. He could have had me call the warranty company back and get an HVAC consult. Instead, he unclogged the pipe & within minutes the problem was solved. Very pleased!

S&S Plumbing has saved us on two different occasions. We have used them at a rental property to find a specialty sized water heater to fit in a tiny closet with an indoor air handler (which would have taken days if we used someone else) and install it in the tight space. We needed them quickly to keep the renter happy and they went above and beyond for us. We also had them install and run a water line to a new refrigerator at our own home. Both times they showed up on time, were professional and finished the job to our liking. I would suggest them to my friends and family and we will use them in the future.

Nicholas was professional, personable, and prompt with repairs. He also was patient while explaining the repairs he was doing and was more than willing to share his knowledge. Will absolutely be using S&S services again.

Recently had a water pressure issue at my residence.  These guys were outstanding.  Stayed in touch the entire time letting me know exactly when they'd arrive and were there promptly.  Answered all my questions professionally and took care of the issue fast.
Great company and I'll definitely use again if the opportunity arises

A++++++ service! We had a new water heater installed under another company that was under our home warranty. Not only did they not install it correctly they  put us in danger by not installing proper heating and water regulators with it. We were put in touch with S&S to fix our issue and they not only fixed it but was very very professional and talked with us through every step and why these things were important. I won’t call anyone else to do the job!
Thank you again for your top notch service!

S&S fixed a major problem for us after another plumber that was dispatched by our home warranty company improperly installed a new hot water heater.   They provide top notch service on time and they know what they are doing.   Pros in every sense of the word.   Highly recommend!    Call S&S
Marty and his crew were great to work with.  Outside pipes needed replacing and S&S came and did the job promptly and for a far better price that those "big name" guys. Very happy with the service.

Nicholas showed up right on time to the appointment.  Walked us through everything that was need, and even educated us on a few different issues that we need to be aware of with our faucet that was installed.  He was quick, curtious and followed through.  No issues, and kept us up to date when he was going to be headed our way.  Could not have been happier.  Even got us in a day early, which was a welcomed surprise!

I had a plumber to come out and charge us for “fixing” a leak that turns out was not even where the leak was coming from. When the leak continued, we contacted S&S and they actually took the time to find where the leak was coming from.. They also took the time to work around my schedule to find a convenient time to be there. I would highly recommend them for any plumbing needs!!
Service was second to none! Top notch! Great people, customer service and did the job perfectly. Highly recommend!
Came an hour away through snow to repair my water heater. I appreciate them . A couple of good guys

The owner, Marty, gave the most responsive, professional, and friendly service I’ve experienced. He was able to fix all of my issues at my new home and at an affordable price! I have used S&S several times and they’re the only plumbing service in Birmingham that I trust! 10/10
Nicholas came out, he was very knowledgable and professional. He helped with all my plumbing needs. Would definitely recommend.
Nicolas was fantastic.  He was very honest and upfront about everything he was doing.  Very professional and did a great job.  I would highly recommend him!
Nicolas is very professional,  knowledgeable and compassionate. He is an excellent communicator.

Prompt and courteous service.  Worked with my schedule.  Had to make a second trip to my house and he made everything right.  They were sent out by my home warranty service, but I would definitely use them even without the warranty service.

Nicholas was awesome!  He is extremely knowledgeable and his work was superb.  He was an excellent communicator and very professional.  I would highly recommend S and S to anyone looking for a plumber in the Birmingham area.
Fantastic experience. Nicholas was very prompt and professional. He was able to fix for $75 a problem another company tired to charge me $900 for. Job well done.
Our water heater broke over a weekend and Nicholas fit us into his busy schedule on the same day to fix it! Greatly appreciate his professionalism and thoroughness in getting the job done!
Amazing service and great company to do business with! They show up on time, clean cut, explains everything and are very patient.

Great Service by a Great Tech! Nicholas Lyons was very professional, answered all questions I had, and let me watch over his shoulder the whole time he worked. You can tell he cares about doing right by his customers.
I want to brag on Nicolas Lyons. He came out to my house on 03/18/2019 to fix my water heater. He was very professional, helpful and most of all nice. So, major kudos to Mr. Lyons. Have a great day.

five_star_reviews.text: I just bought a home and wanted to have a gas stove but had an electric one. Mr Tillman came out and gave me a free estimate to run the gas for the stove and fix my water heater that needed an expansion tank. He was very reasonable and came in a couple days to do the work. Very friendly and answered all our questions. I would definitely use him again.
Excellent and professional. Knowledgeable. Reasonably price. He did a great job!
Fast thermostat installation and inexpensive!

five_star_reviews.text: Hot water faucet on the bathtub started to drip quite heavily - like it will not turn off.  Daniel Goforth was recommended by our neighbor. We called him and he fixed the problem the same day. Excellent job indeed.

Sometimes you make the right decision.  Daniel Goforth immediately responded to my request for an estimate to provide and install a tankless hot water heater.  Helped me decide on model and what was included in his estimate to achieve what I wanted.  Yep!  Again,  immediate response to install the unit.  I was impressed with care and attention to details to my satisfaction.  While Daniel was here I asked a simple question, he immediately told me the answer and solved the problem.  I always ask myself:  Would I make the same decision.  Yep! Like watching A&E.  Time (and money) well spent. I now enjoy “endless hot water” knowing I can call Daniel for any future plumbing needs.

These guys are who you want to use for your plumbing problems. They are quick to respond and are very professional. They found the problem with our project, and took care of the problem. I will definitely let all my neighbors and friends know about them. They are the best. We need more honest hardworking guys like the two that worked for us today. And their price is very fair.

Had roots growing near the PRV which caused a leak. Goforth came out same-day and gave a reasonable price to replace the old PRV and shut-off valve, both of which were not working correctly. So far everything seems great. Very friendly and professional service. Highly recommended!!

Installed 5 new comfort height toilets and put in new pressure regulator as well as a new main shut off, very good job, they had to carry the toilets up multiple flights of stairs, very neat and no mess to clean up.  No leaks or problems afterwards, always a good thing!

five_star_reviews.text: We had the best experience with Jon and his team.  I feel like they are set out to change the stereotype of plumbers!  They were clean, nice vehicles, respectful and best of all, they are great at plumbing.  They ran new water lines to our house and then completed all new plumbing in our house. Jon also helped me plan some of the details of my faucet placement that I was not thinking about.  Very professional crew.  We could not be happier!

By far the best plumber in our area. If you want it done right the first time call them. They laid half a mile of pipe for me and fixed water heater issues. Went through other plumbers and after the four leaks just gave up. These guys can do it all. Call them, they fix it and you don't have to worry about it again. You will get your monies worth here.

Really easy to work with Jon Barnes Plumbing. Great prices and outstanding work. Had a leaking toilet flange that Jon identified quickly and ensured the repair was clean and professional. Several months later, our hot water heater began leaking. Jon and Joey saved us from having to replace our hot water heaters and also fixed a water pressure issue that we had been trying to find a cause for since we moved into our home.
If you’re looking for a great plumber, this is it.
This is the most efficient and professional business I have worked with! I can’t speak highly enough about them. David Whitehead was running my project - he is incredible.
Great experience resolving a gas leak! Timely communication, reasonable pricing, and Joey came out quickly to help.
Jon is the BEST plumber in the area! He is totally trustworthy and great at communicating with you. He is on time, friendly and reasonable. Definitely reccomend him.

five_star_reviews.text: Ryan Reynolds did a great job running the gas piping from our new fireplace to our tanks which he delivered and installed as well. Very neat and organized. Very easy to ask questions of, both before and after the install.  Would use again for any gas appliance installs or issues.
We had Ryan help with our kitchen sink and bathroom sink and planning on having him help with replacing our water heater. He is very knowledgeable and reliable

Ryan came out and evaluated our needs, and then described what he needed to do to add a line for our new fireplace. The work was done on time and they were very professional. I wholeheartedly recommend Reynolds Plumbing and Gas!

Ryan and his team have always been prompt, professional, and courteous with their services. He installed a tankless water heater for our family a few years back and has done some other smaller plumbing work. Highly recommend!

Ryan is honest and so knowledgeable in his field. He was able to come out to inspect and address the issue within the same day. It is so refreshing to know I have someone that I can truly count on to get the job done and ensure it is done with perfection in mind.
Been using them for a few years on recommendation. I can't speak highly enough. The work is good, they're tidy all you could need. Very professional and reliable

Ryan came out and properly fixed our washing machine drain, and then properly installed both the washer, as well as the water connection on our fridge. He is extremely responsive, knowledgeable, and is extremely professional in nature. Would recommend him to anyone!

Reynolds Plumbing has serviced my construction company for years. There has never been a job to big or to small that was not completed on time and as estimated. Their knowledge of new plumbing techniques and new technology is unsurpassed in the industry. I have recommended and will continue to recommend Ryan and Derrick to all of my customers.

Best plumbing company in town!!  I’ve been using them for years. They are always respectful, professional and knowledgeable.  They are always there when they say they will be. I can’t recommend Reynolds Plumbing highly enough!!

Reynolds has always worked in a timely manner for us, if you ask questions that are important to you he is Knowledgeable. By far the best gas guy I have ever had work for me. He always shows up with a smile on his face and presents a great attitude.

five_star_reviews.text: Unbelievable experience! Will never call another plumber again. I called for what I thought was a small issue, they spent HOURS repairing a much more extensive issue. Constant contact throughout the process!!

We’ve hired Josh and his crew several times over the years and every time they have shown up on time, performed the work in a professional manner and very reasonably priced! Local guys who love their community and show that pride in their work.
Amazing team! Quick,knowledgeable,and affordable service!Thank you Josh and Jake!

One late night in November, I experienced that the pressure in my hot water line wasn’t the same as usual. Well after checking everywhere inside my home, I discovered that I indeed had an awful hot water line leak under my home in its crawl space. What’s a girl to do? Well call her granny of course! Granny gives me a referral to a Graham Plumbing, and I am so happy she did! I couldn’t praise the gentlemen that came to my rescue long enough. From start to finish there was no disappointment. Pricing is definitely reasonable. I will forever be calling Graham for all my plumbing needs. :)

Graham Plumbing showed up about 2 hours after calling them. They completed a problem I was having with a new washing machine install. They were prompt, courteous, and very knowledgeable. I would use them again and I highly recommend them. Thanks for a job well done!

five_star_reviews.text: Quick response time and got it done in a timely manner

I had a sewer blockage on New Year's Eve.  Everything was backed up.  I called Express Rooter in the early afternoon and shortly after 3:30 Douglas showed up.  He got the blockage cleared and all was working well.  Douglas did a very prompt, very professional repair.  I will definitely use him again as need arises.
Excellent  service, on time , polite staff, very helpful and the prices are great!!!

The best!!!!! Call them Alabama
The owner is very knowledgeable and respectful
His team is the best.
Douglas was fantastic,  kind,  and informative.  He also fixed a small leak that they found while they were snaking the drain. Awesome service.
Douglas and his guys always do a great job for me. He was on time and done in just a bit.

Douglass with Express Rooter was great!   He went above and beyond to make sure everything was completed today.  He even lined up the city inspector to come out for me while he was here.    I would highly recommend them to anyone.    Good job
Daniel Morris is an outstanding technician.  Solved a major clog issue with backyard inground pool in short order.

Exceptional response and professionalism!
Highly recommend
Professional, on time, tidy...resolved our issues.
Great service!
Daniel was so kind and friendly! Got everything taken care of and was very quick!

It’s so refreshing to have a business follow through on everything they say. Not only did they come out the next day, but they arrived early. They were very thorough, fixed the problem, and cleaned up. I would highly recommend them!
Were prompt, professional and tidy. Would (and do) highly recommend  to others
Daniel worked hard and did a great job

I had an emergency with an outside faucet that broke off on a Saturday afternoon. Express Rooter was able to make the repair after hours and we had water for the weekend. The service was excellent. Staff was professional and work done was top notch.
Communication was great, quick and easy process, felt safer about coming to property due to name and picture sent to me of the technician before service was done.
Awesome company and even better people. If you call them they will be there! Always do a great job!
Plumbing problem was found quickly and repaired without any further issues! Friendly staff and amazing  service !! Thank you guys!!

Excellent customer service as soon as I contacted Express Rooter, beginning with Maddie, I received a text message informing me of the technician’s contact information that would be coming his name and a picture to show me who would be arriving. Mason sent me a text message with his arrival time and kept me informed when he was a few minutes late.  He arrived and was very kind and polite. He took off his shoes before entering my home and he let me know that he had never found a tooth crown in anyone’s kitchen sink. He loosened the cv elbow pipe and poured its contents out in a plastic container and there was my crown. I was so excited because his cost was a lot cheaper than a new crown. He provided me with his business card and I will definitely use his services again and let everyone know how professional he was. He even pet my dog that was anxious and she calmed down barking. The price for his service was very reasonable and he was a kind young man.
It was a goood visit

From Maddie to Douglas and their extraordinary team. They are WONDERFUL!,   I have to express how grateful I am to them for coming to my home after 4 days with no hot water( no fault of theirs) and put my heater in for my family.
They are the most caring dedicated people. 10 stars is what I give- over and beyond. Thank you guys so much.
Fast professional service!

We had a clog that caused an overflow of water at our business (North AL Glass) over night. Express Rooter came out very fast - Found and fixed the issue quickly. They even stopped back by later in the day to ensure everything was still working properly. I will definitely be referring everyone I know to them. Thank you for all of you hard work.

The two gentlemen that came to work on my kitchen sink plumbing were very polite, informative and did a great job.  From my 1st call to the office, I got calls, text giving me updates as to when the plumber would be here & even got a picture of Mason so that I would know what he looked like.  From start to finish, this was by far the best experience I've EVER had.
Thank you,
Cindy Nelson
Fast quality work! Very dependable! Would highly recommend to anyone

Outstanding and prompt service with follow up
Thank uou

Douglas runs a great company. Our septic grinder pump went out and he came within 2 hours of me calling and had it fixed within 24 hours when others couldn’t get me a pump for a week. Can’t recommend him and his crew enough!
I got same day service. Professional, friendly & efficient.
I appreciate it being done right
Douglas Sapp has a strong work ethic and gets the job done right.

five_star_reviews.text: Derrick, the owner, answered the phone call himself and on short notice we arranged a visit requiring special effort to obtain a new improved part for my kitchen to replace the hot water shut-off valve. He and his associate arrived 10 minutes early and completed the job in under one hour. I will certainly call on Cherokee Services if I need any plumbing jobs in the future. Art Kelly, Birmingham, AL
Derrick and partner were timely, professional and awesome with completion of repairs! Our world need more people of businesses who cares about the customer!! Five stars aren’t enough, God Bless them!

Derrick and his assistant replaced my hot water heater today. They were efficient, professional, and friendly. I couldn’t have asked for better service.
Thanks Guys!

5 stars all around! Derrick is the BEST and John is very quick to respond, diagnose, and fix whatever issue you have. The service is of very high quality for a very reasonable price. If you need a handy dandy plumber at your service, there's no one better to call.
Mr. Derrek fixed my sink in no time! He is an amazing, honest and dependable person! Thank you !

Mr. Derrick is awesome! His price was low but his quality of service was high. He was prompt and most importantly, honest. This man knows how to run a business. If you call anybody else other than Mr. Derrick for your plumbing needs, I hate to tell you but you’re wrong. Make it easy on yourself and call this man first. Thank you so much! I got you saved in my contacts for the next plumbing mishap I have!
Derrick and his helper are fast and reliable. He is the only one we call for any plumbing problem we have.
Cherokee Services has worked for me a few times and each time they have been outstanding. They will always be my plumbers.
Derrick repaired my bathroom shower faucet instead of replacing it. I’m very happy with the results and it saved  me money. Will be calling him again when I need a plumber.

They showed up when they said they would. Cherokee Plumbing was the only one out of the 4 plumbing companies I called came out and fixed my water problem. I would recommend them to all friends and family. Very pleased with the quality work

Mr. Derrick and John came the day we called, resolved our pipe issue and installed a new p-trap. Extremely polite, professional and knowledgeable.  Call them when you need plumbing repairs-you won’t be disappointed.

Derrick and John provided us with excellent customer service,  quality work and fair pricing! Moreover, they arrived on time and quickly resolved my issue. I definitely recommend Cherokee Plumbing  Service for your plumbing needs.

Derrick was a honest man,
I would recommend his service to anyone. It's hard to find honest dependable people these day's it was an honor meeting him and his worker and  I will be using his sevice again.

We found a leak in our water line on our side of the meter.  Derrick called back about 30 minutes after we left a message.  He and his crew came out about noon the next day to fix the leak.  The temperatures were down in the 30's, at least the sun was shining and the wind was down.  I will definitely call them the next time we need a plumber.

Derrick has done repair work at our home and our rental house.  He and his team are professional and provide very good service.  He is easy to work.  I will be calling Cherokee Plumbing next time I need work done.

Derrick and John installed my new toilet in record time. I had some issues I was concerned with with the flooring and the age of my house but NO PROBLEMS AT ALL!!!! Price was very reasonable. I will call them for any future issues I have in the future!!!!!!!!

Derrick has completed 3 jobs for us and we have always been completely satisfied. Our old water heater was making terrible noises and all indications pointed to a new one. My husband recently had a quadruple bypass and was unable to do the installation himself. He called Derrick only to learn Derrick broke his wrist and was not able to do the job but he has a journeyman named John. We coordinated an appointment . John was exceptional! Prompt, very personable and thorough. We are so pleased with the work that was done and the price we paid. If you ever need a plumber we highly recommend Cherokee Services Plumbing!
Derrick is the best! I highly recommend his service. He does wonderful work.

Derrick is the best!  They have been to my home four times for different problems and always do a great job at a reasonable price.  He always returns phone calls, is always prompt and reliable.  I have a very old home with old unusual plumbing and I wouldn't call anyone else!
Very good service at fair prices. Thank you
He came out at night and fixed the problem quickly. I have used Cherokee Plumbing service before and have always been very happy that I called them. great Professional!
Great plumber and very reasonably priced. I would not consider any other plumber in the area.

This is definitely the person to call whenever you need a plumber and your husband don't have time to get to it lol.. he shows up on time and does great work I have used him for the last 2 years and I have no complaints. But again as long as the work gets done I'm happy and my husband's happy because he doesn't have to listen to me complain I highly recommend him
Derek is great The only one I call
They did a great job and were quick too!

Derek is awesome!! I told him the issue I was having with my bathroom faucet and he knew immediately what the problem was. We scheduled a time for him to come out and correct it. He was prompt and very courteous!! Will certainly be the first person I call if I have future plumbing issues!
Cherokee Plumbing is great! Dependable, knowledgeable, and quick!
Derek was so nice and he's funny too kept me laughing! He knows what he's talking about. He will be my go to plumber from now on .

five_star_reviews.text: I recently experienced a challenging situation when our hot water heater burst, creating a significant mess and leaving us without water. Thankfully, Central Alabama Plumbing, LLC was procured by my home warranty service, and they immediately contacted me about the emergency. From the very start, their response was exceptional. The Central Alabama Plumbing team understood the situation's urgency and promptly scheduled a visit. The technician who arrived was incredibly nice and obviously very knowledgeable about his trade. He assessed the situation quickly and efficiently, explaining the replacement process clearly. It was evident that he took great pride in his work and wanted to ensure we had the best solution for our home. The installation of the new water heater was seamless, and they made sure to tidy up after the job was completed. I truly appreciated their professionalism and the care they took in our home during a stressful situation. Overall, my experience with Central Alabama Plumbing, LLC was outstanding with their quick response, professionalism, and expertise made a significant difference in navigating this emergency. I highly recommend their services to anyone in need of plumbing help!
Very nice and affordable!!  Will call if needed again!

Central Alabama Plumbing is an outstanding company. They came out and unclogged my toilet. They were on time and very thorough in there work. I would definitely suggest them to anyone needing plumbing work done.
Chuck replaced a water reducing valve for our home and did an amazing job! We recommend him for any job!

I had an excellent experience with Central Alabama Plumbing! From the friendly customer service to the skilled plumber who arrived on time, everything was top-notch. They quickly diagnosed the issue, provided clear solutions, and completed the job efficiently. I appreciated their follow-up to ensure everything was working well. Highly recommend for anyone in need of plumbing services!
Very quick to come out when I called in an emergency with a backed up drain. I would definitely call them back for any plumbing need.

Excellent service, I’ve used CAP a couple of times now. They have always showed up when they said they would, got the job done and done right at a fair price. I would highly recommend CAP for any of your plumbing needs.

I am so excited and pleased with the work they did for me. They dug the ditch, installed the regulator and laid over 450 feet of pex waterline to get public water established. Very professional, efficient and got it all done in one day!! I've not had any problems or leaks and my water pressure is wonderful. Will use again and highly recommend.
I'm a first time home buyer and this was my first problem and for me to meet this business was God sent. Nice and genuine and and service was the best I could have ask for. Thank you for your service

five_star_reviews.text: Hardworking and helpful. I highly recommend

Amazing! Prices were very reasonable and I greatly appreciated the written proposal prior to starting so I knew what to expect. Cannot recommend him enough! I needed the original dishwasher (1960s version) removed from my house and the new one installed. The biggest issue was the original was installed 1" below the floor level and from what others said would need to be sawed out. Mike came out and took a look and was able to remove the older dishwasher without sawing and without too much fuss. He was super friendly and worked efficiently.

We just purchased a home in Columbus and needed a variety of work done from installing floodlights to installing a new dishwasher to assembling a trampoline and child’s play set to assembling and hanging two porch swings to putting new hardware and shower heads in the bathrooms and a few other items. Mike did a great job. Did everything well and as promised. We will definitely use him again.
They complete monthly walk throughs of vacant properties and take photos and complete reports. Very responsive. Prices are reasonable. Communication is great! I would recommend this company.

five_star_reviews.text: I love their work!! Love the dedication

I had a terrible leak in my home and it caused the plumber to have to cut holes in the ceiling and walls in order to locate the leak.  The water damaged my upstairs and downstairs flooring.  I called Jay's and not only did they jump right in to help, they completed this complex job in just a week.  They also worked with the Insurance company on my behalf for my claim.  They did a Great Job!!!!  My house looks great.  They even removed the popcorn texture in my Dining room and Kitchen and it looks awesome.  I recommend them to anyone that needs their help in water damage repair or any other repairs or improvements.  They also Really care for their customers.  Thanks to Jay's Home Improvement for making my home livable again!
They do a very good job and above all, they are very responsible, I loved their work, I would definitely work with them again 🤗

Jay did a wonderful job on my floors.  I had a flood in my entire home and he jumped in  and got my job done very quick and it looks beautiful!  Thank you, Jay for a job well done!  I really appreciate you!
The best ever around he will get the job done in a timely matter very professional if you need anything done to your home call him

Jay's Home Improvement renovated my whole house. Walls, floors, completed a bathroom with walk-in tub, tile floors, toilet, cabinets, shelves, all electrical, plumbing, installed heaters, light fixtures, ceiling fans, hardware, ice maker, windows, waterline. They were even nice enough nice enough to install me window blinds. They're very respectful young men and traveled to Florence for Huntsville. Highly recommended

Jay and his crew fully renovated a home for a family member of mine! My wife and I oversaw the project. They were professional, timely, business oriented, receptive to our needs, and did an outstanding job! Jay was very prompt with his replies by email or text. I highly recommend them!

They were very professional from the moment I spoke to them on the phone. The quote was given and I was told the days they would be working. They were at my house at those given times. I did my walkthrough and anything that I had questions about was addressed. They did an excellent job! I’m happy!

These guys go above and beyond. They fixed an emergency plumbing issue that turned into a minor home renovation and did so in miserable conditions! It literally rained the whole time they were working. We will be calling them again and would recommend them to friends and family in a heartbeat. They do good work and are very affordable!
Very neat and professional quality work! Honest and on time. Finished our home as scheduled.

They were  punctual and professional.  He took the time to explain what was going on. He also showed me where the previous contractor cut corners and cost me more money not to mention time wasted. At the end they finished a half day before expected! I plan to use them over and over again with future investment properties!! Satisfaction guaranteed
Never been happier . Jay is definitely the person to go to !!
Top tier customer service and professional quality work. I will always choose Jay's for any remodeling services.
Very professional, great work ethic, dependable and very eager to please. I highly recommend!!!!

I HIGHLY  RECOMMEND THIS COMPANY You couldn't ask for a better service, prompt, reasonable an very professional.  If I could rate Jay's Improvement with 100 or More Stars I Would..  Thanks For Everything..

I desperately wanted a nice outdoor space to sit out and relax without all the that the south has to offer. And when I tell y’all they did an amazing job. I am sooo happy with their service. I’d hire them again in a heartbeat and recommend them to anyone looking to remodel or better their space. 10/10. The enclosed my space installed a light and fan and worked so proficiently. I mean just look at how beautiful it is!!
Jay went above and beyond. Educated me on the process and provided great service for my remodel.

five_star_reviews.text: 9/1/23 Mr McGuire came out (Goat Rock area)  due to alarm sounding on my septic. Very quick response time. Super friendly service. Reasonably priced. Highly recommend and will use them in the future.

Mr. Ed came out to service my septic tank in Feb 2023.... I had an issue with my septic tank this past weekend,I called Mr. Ed today 05-30-2023 he can came out TODAY and rectified the issue,and told me if I had any other issues not to hesitate to call him.... Not only is  Mr. Ed and his crew professional,Mr.Ed is very personable and friendly....  I  highly recommend M&M for your septic tank needs....

Mr Ed I'm assuming the owner, came out this morning 02/03/2023 to Fort Mitchell to service my septic tank, he was very nice,professional and thorough, did a great job.... He wasn't satisfied, until I was satisfied.... Thanks,Mr. Ed GREAT JOB,l definitely will be recommending to my friends and family...
They were very quick and done a great job.
They are fast, personable and professional. They also, recommended and installed Tank Risers for easy maintenance in the future.

5 Star they always find the source of the problem. Over 10 years I have had 2 issues with my septic pump. The first problem everyone told me I needed a new pump and It couldn't  be repaired. M & M came out and repaired the pump because it just had something wrapped up in the pump saving me hundreds. The next issue, others said we needed a new pump and I called M & M they came out and found my breaker went bad. I will never call another when I have an issue again. They are the most honest, always professional and polite, get to the root of the problem, and find the best solution saving home owners money.
Good customer service.  Fast and dependable!!

five_star_reviews.text:
Discovered my septic system was backing up on Saturday and called Mr Paton and he said he could be at my house at 7 AM on Sunday to pump my tank. Arrived on time and completed cleaning out my septic system and a short time at a fair price especially for a Sunday service call.
Very professional and knowledgeable of his business.
I would highly recommend him and will use him in the future if needed.
Payton's Septic is super professional,  courteous and his prices are extremely reasonable. He will undoubtedly be your best choice for your septic needs.

Great experience! He arrived when he said he would and was very professional. He took his time to make sure our tank was emptied thoroughly. It was apparent they really care about the quality of their work. Would highly recommend!

At 3:30 pm on a Thursday afternoon I noticed my yard had sewage water bubbling from where my septic tank is. I called Mr. Payton and explained what I saw and that I needed to get it pumped ASAP due to having a party the next day. After a full day's schedule Mr. Payton and crew showed up at 7:00 pm pumped and inspected my system.
Payton's have my business from here on out.

Payton's Septic Services is TOP NOTCH!   Mr. Payton and his crew are professionals of the highest quality.  They showed up right on time, did a fantastic job on our septic tank and the price we were quoted was the price we paid!   My husband and I HIGHLY recommend calling Payton's Septic Services!  We are Payton's Septic Services customers for life and i guarantee you and your family will be too!
Fast, friendly and efficient service. My family home needed some repair work to our outdoor pond and sprinkler system. We were able to get everything fixed in one afternoon. We definitely recommend!

Great Service!! We had an 8:00 appt. We received a call stating they were on their way. They arrived on time and were very professional. The job was completed in a professional and timely manner. If/when we have our tank serviced again we will definitely be calling them.

First off, my wife and I had the total nightmare of our septic system suddenly failing and we were not able to take a shower, flush the toilet, do laundry, or dishes.  Furthermore, we had no idea where our septic tank was.

They were able to find the septic tank, which is somehow partially under our AC unit and our deck (Look, we didn't build this house, okay?) which felt like waking up from a nightmare only to wake up and find out it's much worse than that.

But these guys were able to so skillfully, and delicately move around their obstacles with no damage to anything, and get our septic tank fixed. I am beyond impressed and so very thankful!

This company you can rely on. Called and they kindly added us to the daily schedule. Mike doesn't any $#!+ behind, (pun intended). This is the only company that we have called on over the 17 years we have been here! Grade A $#!+ crew.
