five_star_reviews.text: This was our first interaction with this company and it was definitely the right call!!  From scheduling the appointment to finalizing payment, the whole process was quick & easy.  We only had to wait a few days for a routine appointment and Jeremy, the tech who responded to our home, was very friendly & professional.  He completed the work in a fraction of the time we expected, updated me on the status of the septic system & answered all my questions.  For their professionalism & courteous customer service, I absolutely recommend AJ’s!!

AJ’s Septic Service is a very professional business! If we could give a higher rating than 5 stars we would. We had heard great things about their work and professionalism and after reading such high reviews we did not even get a second bid. With reviews like that we knew they had to be doing a great job at what they do. Our job was dirt work over existing field lines and laying drainage pipe from our gutters to divert water from our house. Drew was the young man sent to do our work and all I can say is WOW, what a nice person he is. He is a perfectionist at his job and strives to do his best work for you and wants you to be pleased with the work you are paying for. When we called about the job they were very prompt in getting back with us.  Customer service is a high priority in their business. Highly recommend them to anyone.
So glad we called AJ's to come help us out. Very courteous, friendly, and knowledgeable.. Thank you!

They were quick to respond.  We set a date but they were not sure what time they would be able to get to me. I work 30 minutes away so ( I believe it was Jeremy) contacted me by phone telling me he was heading to my house and understood that I worked 30 minutes away. We discussed what needed to completed. He stated he would call me back when he was finishing up to give me time to drive home.  I was contacted as told.  When I arrived we discussed everything, all my questions were answered and I was extremely pleased with the job and the information. I would highly recommend AJ's septic to anyone especially at a time when it is very difficult to get anyone to call you back or to actually show up to do the work.  Jeremy did a wonderful job.

Super nice folks that did a great job. We're moving into a new home and they were quick with scheduling, they call back when they miss your call and they show up on time and ready to help. We had some confusion with the sellers on the exact location of the tank and they were kind enough to work with our real estate agent and came back out shortly to get everything taken care of. Highly recommended.
They did a great job. I am so happy with their job

When we noticed some stinky water at the edge of our yard we called another service first who quoted us astronomical amounts to cut up our concrete and replace field lines. AJ's came & pumped our septic tank, told us our field lines were working great and that a possible leaky toilet was most likely the culprit. These guys were so nice, on time, professional, and so helpful. They were quick to offer alternative solutions to help fix the issue rather than just charging us money to fix something that didn't need it. Thank you guys so much for all the help and the smiling faces while doing such a dirty job and in this awful heat!
Good folks, good work & fair price.
AJ's has always done an excellent job for us. Would definitely recommend them to anyone needing septic services.
Great guys came out on Friday afternoon before a holiday so I could make it through the weekend,, then came back next week and fixed the septic tank.  Thank you

five_star_reviews.text: I am so thankful for Crimes septic Tank Pumping. I enlisted Ronnies services on 04-12-2023 to pump (2) septic tanks. He came at precisely the time we had scheduled. he performed the exact services we had contracted for and at a price that I thought was very competitive. In todays society it is almost impossible to find anyone that even wants to works. His professionalism & expertise is only exceeded by his great attitude & politeness. I highly recommend Ronnie Crimes services.

I was home visiting my parents and woke up to a plumbing disaster, called at 6am left a message, received a call 10 minutes later. He stated his truck was being worked on, but he would make it that day regardless. He arrived earlier than expected ( which was awesome) took care of the problem, very courteous, professional and took care of mama and Daddy’s issue!!! We can’t THANK UOU ENOUGH. Great company… HIGHLY RECOMMEND, if I could give them 10 stars I would!!!
Crimes septic service is simply the BEST.

Our septic system started acting up last night.  Toilets and showers bubbling anytime you run any water for any reason.  We are not originally from here so we looked around online and went with them for the five star reviews we saw.  My wife called them the next morning they quoted a very reasonable price and came out earlier than expected.  Turned out we were about one flush away from it backing up into the house.  I didn't get the chance to meet them because I was at work but from what I was told, I wish I did.  They had to do a bit more work than just a standard pumping but still were willing to stick to the original quoted price.  She told me they were so friendly and professional and efficient that she agreed to pay them the higher amount anyway.  Alot of people could have chosen to rake her over the coals telling her they had to dig up the whole drain field or some major catastrophe.  She just had a heart attack and no one deserves that anyway.  I didn't meet them but I can't express in words how thankful I am for this company and the service they provided.  With honesty, courtesy and professionalism.  I would recommend them to anyone and everyone who needs any septic services.  Couldn't be happier.  I wouldn't even think of calling anyone else.  You guys have our business for as long as we have this tank.  Thank you and God Bless!

We needed help very urgently, and they were able to get us on the schedule and taken care of quickly! The crew that came were happy to answer questions and even explained things to my kids as they looked on. They even went out of their way to save some plants near the dig sight! I’m very pleased with the service and the attitudes of all the staff i was in contact with!
I will be using them for all future maintenance!

Look No Further! ONLY place to call in the greater Montgomery area. Veteran and military friendly, great staff, and easy to work with. Only company that called back and came out. Nichole was friendly and worked with me and kept me informed of their schedule. Russ, Dontaves, and Lewis were professional, informative , friendly, and very knowledgeable about my situation. They worked with me get the job done right and quickly. I have them in my contacts under favorites! We will use them again and I highly recommend you call them for all your septic needs!
Friendly customer service
They came out the same day while other companies delayed up to a week. Great service, friendly and professional. I would definitely recommend

Miss Sandy is a SAINT!!! And a literal wealth of knowledge…I have never learned so much about septic systems and I owned a septic home for 10 years prior to this one.

For awareness, we bought our home nearly a year and a half ago and have had sporadic septic issues ever since. We used a different company to pump once and they didn’t even reinstall caps properly.

One call to Miss Sandy and not only did her team respond to pump immediately … she personally showed up to discuss our concerns. Then, she took it upon herself to find our original septic approval plans, theorize potential causes for our issues, and give us advice/a way forward. She isn’t coming in to make radical, costly repair suggestions, she is truly coming in to get to the root of the issue through the best means possible.

Long and short, she isn’t in the business to make a quick buck on her costumer … it’s the exact opposite. She truly values and cares about each person she’s called to aid and will exhaust every viable effort with the least amount of cost and disruption. She is clearly driven by morality, integrity and hard work. We will never even consider doing business with any one else.

If you need help with septic routine mx and/or woes as well as install—this is literally the only business you should call!

Joseph and Lewis were both very professional, friendly and informative. They came out to do a septic cleaning, inspection and field line inspection. They were very helpful and patient answering my questions and honest when they couldn’t give an exact answer. They left everything cleaned up and tidy too. I can’t say enough what a relief it was to have such nice people do a great job for us.

allprosepticservice.name: All-Pro Septic Service

website_content.aboutUs: All-Pro Septic Service is a trusted local provider of comprehensive septic system solutions in Phenix City and the surrounding Columbus area. Our team of skilled professionals specializes in septic tank pumping, grease trap cleaning, system repairs, and routine maintenance, ensuring your septic needs are met with expertise and efficiency.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Experience the peace of mind that comes with reliable, affordable, and professional septic services tailored to your needs.
sellingPoints: Prompt and courteous service from our team of highly trained technicians.
Comprehensive solutions for all your septic system requirements, from pumping to repairs.
Commitment to cleanliness and attention to detail, leaving your property in pristine condition.

allprosepticservice.research:
### Business Information:

- **Alabama Business Registration/License Details**:
  - All-Pro Septic Service is a Limited Liability Company (LLC) and is BBB Accredited since March 29, 2018. The business was started on April 23, 2018[4].
- **Physical Location and Service Areas**:
  - The business is located at 786 Lee Road 2017, Phenix City, AL 36870. They serve the Phenix City and surrounding areas, including the Columbus area[1][4].
- **Hours and Payment Methods**:
  - The service hours are:
    - Monday to Thursday: 7:30 AM - 7:00 PM
    - Friday: 7:30 AM - 6:30 PM
  - For payment methods, you would need to contact the business directly as this information is not provided in the available sources[4].
- **Years in Operation**:
  - All-Pro Septic Service has been in business since April 23, 2018, making it approximately 6 years in operation as of 2024[4].

### Services & Specialties:

- **Types of Services Offered**:
  - All-Pro Septic Service provides a range of services including septic tank services, septic tank pumping, grease trap cleaning, and maintenance of septic systems. They also handle repairs and routine maintenance for these systems[1][4].
- **Service Areas Covered**:
  - They serve the Phenix City and Columbus areas[1][4].
- **Emergency Service Availability**:
  - While the sources do not explicitly mention 24/7 emergency services, their extended hours suggest they may be available for urgent needs during their operating hours[4].
- **Prices or Rates**:
  - The sources do not provide specific prices or rates. The business emphasizes working with customers to find services that fit their needs and budget[1].

### Customer Reviews & Reputation:

- **Review Summaries with Specific Examples**:
  - All-Pro Septic Service has a 4.9-star rating based on 133 reviews, indicating a high level of customer satisfaction. Reviews typically highlight the reliability, affordability, and professionalism of the services provided[4].
- **BBB Rating and Status**:
  - The business is BBB Accredited with an A+ rating. They have been accredited since March 29, 2018[4].
- **Common Customer Feedback Themes**:
  - Customers often praise the prompt service, cleanliness of the work area, and the overall professionalism of the staff[4].
- **Response to Reviews**:
  - There is no specific information available on how the business responds to reviews, but their high rating and accreditation suggest a positive engagement with customer feedback.

### Owner & Staff:

- **Owner/Management Information**:
  - The owner of All-Pro Septic Service is Mr. Jamie Williams[4].
- **Staff Qualifications**:
  - The business does not provide detailed information on the qualifications of the staff, but they emphasize having a team of professionals who are reliable and affordable[1].
- **Professional Certifications**:
  - There is no specific information available on the professional certifications of the staff, but the business's BBB accreditation and positive reviews suggest a level of professionalism and competence[4].

five_star_reviews.text: I could not be any more satisfied with the service and responsiveness of All-Pro Septic Service. 5/5 recommend. Gaige was extremely helpful, professional, and friendly. He was at our home less than two hours after the call to perform an emergency pumping. I recently  used this company for emptying a grease trap. I couldn't be happier that I found them. They were professional, fast, and very reasonably priced. I am located out of town and couldn't be on site and they were willing to work with me and send me photographs and call me throughout the process so I was up to speed as to exactly what was going on. I highly recommend and would definitely use their services again.

We had an issue with the septic system in our home. Called All-Pro Septic Services yesterday evening. Over the phone was given things to look for to help diagnose the problem and scheduled to have them come out the next day. This morning Gaige and his team showed up, fixed the problem, explained the issue, and offered tips on how to maintain the system. Top notch company and staff.
Knowledgeable and friendly a little more expensive than another company but worth the money.

The reviews are right I see why they are five stars. I highly recommend All-Pro Septic they are very professional and respond quickly to calls. The 2 young men that came out was very quick and professional
The two guys that came to my house where very nice they were very professional  I would recommend them to anyone thank you guys

This company has been absolutely wonderful! We recently bought a home and were told the tank had been pumped a year ago but the previous owners could not provide any info on when it was down or who did it. We didn’t have issues with our system but wanted to have it inspected/pumped just to make sure it was cared for. This team was able to get out to pump it 3 days after our call (it was not an emergency so I was more than happy to wait) they showed up early in the day and got the whole job completed within an hour. They showed me the tank after it was uncovered and were told it looks like it has NEVER been pumped! They were all professional and friendly, gave me advice on how to care for the tank life long as I have never had a septic tank before. They explained in great detail what to watch for and how often to have it pumped, they never tried to upsell me even though it would have been easy as I have no idea about anything septic lol they stood firm on their quote they gave me via email and were even reluctant to take a tip because they didn’t feel it was necessary. If you want an honest and friendly company that doesn’t try to milk you for money this is the one to go with! Even though they were very busy they didn’t seem inconvenienced by all of my questions 10/10 recommend

I have so many good things to say about this company. From Tina (who I’ve learned is the Mom) to her son, Gage who was the guy who came to service our septic system, they were amazing. We moved into a new house a week ago and our septic stopped draining. Gage came out and pumped us and inspected the system. He confirmed it’s not draining. Gave me number to call to have new field lines drawn up then call all pro back to do the service. I have 4 sons and my toddler asks a lot of questions. Gage answered everything. He was very professional and kind. What would usually be a super stressful experience, this company is making me feel confident that it will be fine and they will handle it. Also the pricing!!!! I called 5 different septic companies to get my septic pumped and service and every quote was over 500$ to pump. Some even said it would be another 100$ to dig to be able to pump. My husband is military and dug it before he left the country. All pro came out and after military discount I was only charged 275$ for pumping and inspecting it. If you have septic issues just do yourself a favor and hire All Pro. Photo is my husband thinking he could fix the problem himself 🤣
Jamie was so kind and professional. I chose his company because all the reviews were 5 star. Sorry this is a bit late in getting it done but they are definitely the BEST!!!

five_star_reviews.text: Chris and his guys did a professional job installing our septic system. Highly recommend

five_star_reviews.text: I had an amazing experience with this company! We had previously used another company and will never make that mistake again. Richard Restoration will always be our first choice from now on. The customer service was top-notch, I highly recommend them to anyone looking for excellent service. I was impressed by their commitment to going the extra mile for me. If I could give 10 Stars I would ! Walked us through the whole process and explained everything to us on a level we understood !

I've utilized this company several times for various reasons over the past year, and they have exceeded my expectations each time. I couldn't be more satisfied. Thank you, Richard's Restoration. I will definitely use your services for future needs.
Professional and timely service. 10/10 work, highly recommended. Will be using again for future restoration needs!
Richard and his crew were very professional, friendly and quick. They did two bathrooms for me and if I need more work done to Amy other rooms I'm calling Richard Restoration for sure!

Richard Restoration did an amazing job restoring and remodeling my kitchen and bathroom after water damage due to a leaking pipe. Richie was wonderful to work with and handled all of the insurance claim information, which made the process a lot less stressful for me. His crew was professional, respectful, knowledgeable, and fast. Richie came the same day the leak and damage was found and kept me informed throughout the whole process. He went above and beyond to make sure that my home was properly restored. I love my new kitchen and bathroom! I highly recommend Richards Restoration.
Fantastic job working with my insurance to fix our bathroom after a leak!

This is the best team for all your restoration needs!  Our entire home flooded from a busted pipe upstairs.  Richard and his team responded quickly and they helped us through the entire process.  Great quality work, fast, dependable and honest!  We couldn’t be happier with our home!

Richard's restoration came in at a timely rate, assessed the situation and mitigated my issue within hours of me calling . They took every precaution necessary to keep me and my family safe and taken care of throughout the whole process . Very proffesional business to do work with. They handle everything for you even down to the phone calls. I highly recommend.

Richard Restoration helped our church (Safe Harbor Church of God in Rainbow City) in a very timely manner when a pipe froze and burst on Christmas of 2022. Their company was prompt and professional. They had several people working and therefore were able to finish the work much faster than we anticipated. Besides remediation, they painted walls, repaired sheet rock, and installed flooring. Everything was done with excellence. They even helped us when dealing with the insurance adjuster. We highly recommend Richard Restoration.

Richard Restoration responded quickly to my house when i had a leak and it flooded.  They took care of the problem and remodeled my house. I couldn’t be happier with the outcome.  I appreciate them!   They did such a good job.  Thanks, Richard Restoration! I’m one happy customer and highly recommend them for any of your restoration needs
